English: Stop! Public access is restricted from here on.
No outsiders are allowed past this point!
My name is Kasel, an apprentice knight in service to Orvelia.
What's going on here? These people seem tense for some reason.
You must not have heard. An old vault was found in the underground.
We believe it was where the ancient royal family kept their treasures safe. A team of investigators was dispatched right after the discovery,
but the sudden appearance of monsters is keeping them from doing their job.
Of all places, why are monsters appearing in royal palace?
Except for a few apprentice knights, almost all of the knights were called in to rid the monsters.
The knights will not be able to take care of any other business until everything is settled.
Kasel, don't you think we should leave for now?
I don't think the knights can help anyone else in a situation like this.
Hm...
I may just be an apprentice knight myself, but I'd like to do my part as a knight.
Is there anything I can do to help?
As a matter of fact, we're currently recruiting capable warriors to take on the monsters.
The more help we can get, the faster the knights can resume their everyday duties.
His Majesty promised rewards to those who defeat the monsters.
If you think you're up for it, feel free to lend a hand.
When does the shift rotate again? Let's see... Only 7 years left? Great!
Wow, an ancient tower in a place like this? Interesting.
Huh? Humans! All of you are humans, right?
I've heard of the humans from storytellings before, but I did not expect to see one in my life.
It has been quite a while, Dosarta.
Sister? I'm so glad that you're here!
Oh, and who are these people?
Right. Let me introduce you to the warrior of the Holy Sword, and his companions.
The warrior... of the Holy Sword? Seriously?
That's amazing! The great warrior, in front of my eyes!
Hahaha... Please, I don't deserve to be addressed as 'great'.
Um, Dosarta just called you sister. Does that mean...?
Yes, Dosarta here is my blood sister.
Here, the Tower of Challenge, is something our elven royal family has been taking care of.
It is the task of the royal children to keep watch. We have been doing it in shifts, each shift being 20 years long.
20 years...?
No need to be surprised. 20 years of your lifespan is like 2 years to the elves.
Um, so the warrior of the Holy Sword in a place like this means...
Yes, it's about time we open the gate of the Tower of Challenge.
Sweet! Then I'll be able to see these people often. Looks like I won't be bored from now on.
Sorry to interrupt, but mind telling us about this place?
I've never seen or heard of such a tower standing so tall in Elidora Forest.
This tower existed long before people started recording history.
Our Elven Royal Family has been investigating this tower for a very long time,
yet we still haven't discovered why, and when this tower was built.
However, during the investigation, we found the remains of ancient artifacts.
Furthermore, we even managed to restore the artifacts by putting together the pieces.
Only then did we discover that the artifacts possess unique and strong power.
Unique... and strong?
Speaking of which, since our great warrior is here, let me tell you a story regarding the artifacts.
100 years ago, King Kyle of Orvelia was seeking power to fight off the Demons.
His search led him to the rumored Tower of Challenge. After arriving at the tower, he started climbing it alone.
However, each floor of the tower was filled with fearsome monsters.
According to the investigations, these monsters emit an otherworldly aura.
Nonetheless, King Kyle had to defeat the monsters of the tower to acquire artifact pieces.
An otherworldly aura? So these monsters are from the other dimension?
We don't know the details yet. Everything I've just said is simply inferences by the scholars.
Back to the story, King Kyle later managed to find all the artifact pieces.
And with the help of our Elven Royal Family, he got the artifacts restored.
Afterward, all of Elidora came to praise King Kyle for his victory against all the monsters in this tower,
and as a tribute to his challenging spirit, this tower was named the 'Tower of Challenge.'
That is quite a deep story.
Indeed. The monsters of the tower are still strong and savage.
At one point, the adventurers who had heard of King Kyle's heroic tales entered this tower.
Sadly, they all failed. Some even lost their lives.
That's why our Elven Royal Family has been guarding this tower to prevent anyone from entering it.
However, now that the Demons threaten our land, and the Holy Sword Aea has shown itself once again,
it is time for us to open the gate, so you can acquire the artifacts once again.
I hope this serves as an opportunity to strengthen your power and skill.
King Kyle of Orvelia came to the Tower of Challenge,
requesting access because he needed strong powers to defeat the demons.
He took back the pieces of artifacts from the insane who were still calling for their 'precious',
and put the pieces back together.
Wasn't Kyle cursed by touching the artifact?
Upon putting together the artifacts, an analysis took place,
and it revealed that when the artifacts had been destroyed, the curse too had disappeared.
And the curse will not return, even if those artifacts become whole?
The analysis implied that the curse only worked while the artifact was inside the Tower of Challenge.
While it is believed that no artifacts remain whole as of now, we cannot be sure.
Since those undying cursed ones are still too dangerous,
we have locked the gate of the Tower and watched over it.
But now, things are different. The holy sword showed up, which is a signal that the world is in danger.
Therefore, we are opening the gate today, allowing you to challenge the Tower.
Chapter 1. The Beginning of the Journey
Common calendar year 700, Orvelia Kingdom, King's Plains
About a century ago, a wizard opened the Demon's Gate
and allowed demons to invade the entire continent.
The Dark Lord Angmund
proclaimed himself King of the World
and left the world covered in blood, tears, and screams.
But the righteous marched forth towards the Dark Lord's fortress,\n\nwading through pain and despair.
These heroes were King Kyle of Orvelia,\n\nthe last kingdom of humans, and his brave companions.
A fierce battle raged in front of Angmund's fortress.
While his companions desperately fought off the Dark Legion,
Kyle walked into the Dark Lord's castle alone
and stabbed Angmund's heart with the Holy Sword Aea.
Only the Holy Sword remained.
There was no trace of Kyle or Angmund.
Without their lord, the demons quickly weakened,
and the war ended in victory\n\nfor the people of the land.
By the time peace was restored to the continent\n\nand the wounds of the old war had started to fade,
an unknown darkness creeped around the Holy Sword Aea.
The heroes who fought alongside Kyle
sealed the Holy Sword Aea inside the World Tree\n\nthat Lua, the Goddess of Light, had blessed
and prayed for everlasting protection from the Darkness.
Now, a hundred years have passed after the Demon's Gate opened.
and the traces of war had long since disappeared in Orvelia, the kingdom of humans.
Although humankind believed this peace would continue for a long time,
a shroud of darkness\n\nhad already begun to creep in around the World Tree.
Iris, the Great Priestess of the Lua Order,
sensed the feeble spirit of Angmund
who everyone thought had disappeared for good.
To investigate the situation, the Kingdom of Orvelia dispatches an expedition.
I was so close to becoming a full-fledged knight. Why now!?
Haha. Are you feeling bad because you can't join the expedition?
I'm proud of you, little brother. Look how brave you are even though you are just a squire.
It's not that I feel bad. I want to go with you because I am worried!
Apparently this is the biggest expedition since the war against the Dark Legion! Something big must be coming!
Hahaha. A squire worrying about an expedition of Royal Knights!
If the senior knights hear you, their pride will be bruised. Keep that up and you'll find yourself getting another noogie.
I would put up with a lot of noogies just to go with you.
As a Royal Knight, I'll tell you again, Kasel.
What you need to do is to protect the people of Orvel from danger while we're not around.
For a knight, there is no duty more sacred than protecting their people and country. Don't ever forget that.
Okay. A squire has to trust the expedition and do his work here.
Now, straighten those shoulders, Kasel. You will be a full-fledged knight soon enough.
You will definitely do important things for our homeland someday,
and I will be there with you.
Why are you so serious? This isn't like you. You're scaring me.
Well, let's just say I'm an inspirational man. Hahaha.
Haha. I wouldn't call that very inspirational.
That's right. Just keep smiling like that. I promise to return safely after we complete the mission.
For the honor of the Royal Knights of Orvelia!
Right. The expedition should be fine since they have you. I will await your safe return.
28 Days Later...
I've been waiting for so long, but still no news from the expedition.
Ominous rumors are swirling that this expedition was not a simple investigation,
but a fight against the Demons that have reappeared.
I cannot wait any longer.
If it's really the Demons that they are up against,
I must go.
I can't put my brother, the only brother I have, in danger!
The expedition was headed south, and then east.
If I follow that path, I will definitely catch up to them.
Kasel, where are you going?
Huh? Frey, aren't you supposed to be at the temple?
Today is my day off!
I will come with you if you are leaving to find Clause!
How did you know...?
Because.. I would do the same if I were in your place.
What are you talking about? It's too dangerous for an apprentice priest to leave the castle!
There is no news from the expedition. We don't know what's going on out there.
Hah! Kasel, do you have any idea what priests do?
It's dangerous for priests to go on expeditions on their own.
But don't you realize it's also dangerous for anyone to leave on an expedition without a priest?
But...
You can't tell me not to come, Kasel.
You're not the only one who is worried about Clause.
And, if you also do not return...
Okay. Let's go together, then.
But remember, don't stray too far from me.
We don't know what dangers are lurking about.
Frey, you must leave the temple today.
Great Priestess, what do you mean? Have I done something wrong?
No. You have a mission.
Follow your heart, and you'll find Lua watching over you every step of the way.
My soul only belongs to Lua, the Goddess of Light.
I know how deep your faith is, Frey. I also understand your concern. I can see it in your eyes.
Great Priestess...
Your path awaits you outside the temple, at the entrance to the capital.
The path on which Lua will lead you will be filled with pain and hardships.
Please lead his path with light as he encounters and fights against the darkness.
Hardship? Is that what Clause is going through...
You will be able to meet him at the entrance to the capital, outside the temple.
You must help him so he does not succumb to the Darkness.
A path with pain and hardships...
Will I be able to follow the righteous path?
What is happening in the outside of Orvel...?
Frey! What are you doing there? Hurry up!
Wait, Kasel! I'm coming!
Oh Goddess Lua, please guide us by lighting our way.
and guide us by lighting our way.
We've been walking for more than half a day... I hope nothing happened to the expedition.
Don't worry too much, Kasel. We'll find them.
Go back, Roi!
*Sigh*...
*Sigh* Don't do this, Cleo. The Tower is going crazy about this.
The people at the Tower are worried about you.
Aaaaaaaaaah! Come on!
It's not that I don't understand how you feel, but I'm in a difficult position too.
I also have a job to do.
Just think about how much you're worrying him...
I don't want to hear it! Just go back! Go back!
Ah! excuse me, Mr. Knight!
I think someone's calling you, Kasel.
Huh? Me?
Please help me! He's a pervert!
*Sigh* Cleo...
Kasel! Some weird pervert must be harassing her! Let's help her!
What a pain in the neck.. I'm telling you, this is a misunderstanding!
Just putting this out there, this is a misunderstanding.
I was just...!
Eeeek! Help me!
I don't know who you may be, but stay away from the lady!
Get away from the lady!
Man.. Seriously..?
Look around, you three.
Wolves? When did they...!?
I guess we were making too much noise here.
Well, we have no choice now.
Pervert or not, we have to deal with this first.
I guess we have no choice. Let me handle this!
Those doggies have no sense of common courtesy!
Those doggies can't read the mood!
Everyone, be careful!
Is it over now?
Don't get too comfortable just yet. Stay alert!
Eek! There's more!
That big one over there seems to be the leader.
Looks like he's the head of the pack.
So, killing him will clear the rest?
I guess so.
A pack of wolves near the town...?
Many of the watch were drafted into the expedition.
I'm going back in. Be careful, Frey.
*Whew* I'm glad no one got injured.
It could've been bad if it weren't for this guy.
But he's a pervert.
Lady, you can't go around misjudging a perfectly normal person like me.
Like I told you before, I'm just here to escort Cleo back home.
Am I not, Cleo?
Don't be fooled by his words!
Cleo, will you stop this nonsense?
Are you going to have me raise my blade against them or something? Is that what you want?
Just stop it.
Let's go back, Cleo.
... I still won't go back! I've made myself very clear!
I've made myself very clear!
I'm not playing around this time.
*Sigh* I know that you want to find some clues yourself. But...
You have clues to find...
E-excuse me?
Um... I don't know what's going on between you two, but I can see that you're not a pervert.
We're going to get going now, then.
Sorry, we really thought you were..
It's okay. But Cleo...
I know you didn't mean to cause trouble, but don't you think you should apologize to them?
Humph!
Haha. You don't have to apologize.
I'm sorry we misjudged you.
That's okay. Cleo, was it?
I don't know what clues you are looking for, but I will pray for you.
And this guy who is so worried about you...
What was your name again, Sir?
My name is Roi.
Right. You don't want Mr. Roi, who's so worried about you, to get in trouble now, do you?
Ughh... I'm sorry for putting you in danger..
I'm sorry I put you in danger..
Wow, you really apologized? Maybe I should check to see if hell froze over, too.
Did you just say you're sorry?
But Roi, I'm never going back.
Even if you drag me back, I'll come out again, and again.
I have work I must do.
I'll escape again and again. A million times if I have to. I have something I must do!
Cleo... That's...
Which way are you headed? The direction you were coming from tells me you just left Orvel.
Cleo, stop cutting me off...
Right! You were coming from the opposite direction.
Did you happen to run into an expedition group from Orvel?
Hey, can we take turns..? One at a time please.
Sorry! We are looking for a group that was dispatched from Orvel.
It's been almost a month, but we haven't heard anything from them yet.
Come to think of it, we did see traces of a camp along the way.
Yes, my brother.
Kasel and I grew up with him in the same orphanage...
Hmm...
Come to think of it, we did see traces of a camp along the way.
Ah, that we saw! Why don't you come with us? We'll take you there!
Why don't you come with us! We will take you there!
Since when did you become so nice...
I see...So this is a warmth she never felt at the Tower of the Sage...
I should suggest hiring a priest once we get back.
Huh? What are you mumbling about?
I don't know what scheme you're trying to pull here, but can't you just go?
I have people to help.
I'll stay with these guys. They need my help!
*Sigh* That stubbornness of yours...
Hey, Knight. You wouldn't mind me joining you, do you?
Let us accompany you for a while, Mister Knight.
I have my reasons, too.
What? Roi?
I made an oath to the Tower of the Sage. I can't just abandon it.
Thanks! When I find my brother, I will return the favor.
Good for you, Kasel.
Let me properly introduce myself. My name is Cleo, and I'm a wizard from the Tower of Sage.
My name is Cleo, and I'm a sorceress from the Tower of the Sage.
I'm Roi. I'm supposed to be this kid's escort.
The name is Roi.
I'm Kasel, a squire of Orvelia.
My name is Frey. I'm a disciple of Iris, the Great Priestess.
And.. you are both apprentices?
Why do you seem so surprised, Roi? Are you looking down on them for being apprentices?
Quite the opposite. I was surprised by their competence.
Haha. You were?
That priestess really has a knack for calming Cleo down. This is going to be interesting...
Her talent for influencing people is considerable. Very useful. Fufufu...
Why is he looking at Frey with that wicked grin on his face?
H-he's not really a pervert, is he, Miss Cleo?
That's nonsense.
Haha. Roi may not make a great impression, but I promise he's not the type to molest people.
But, hmm... a man would definitely look at you with a wicked smile... hmm...
It's impolite to stare at a specific part of someone's body like that.
It's impolite to stare at a specific part of someone's body like that.
What? You fool! This misunderstanding started all because of your wicked smile!
No, it started because you treated me like a pervert.
Umm, could we get going now?
I'm sorry to rush you, but I really have to catch up to them.
Oh, you're right! Let's get going!
Wow, what are those?
Slimes! Aren't they adorable?
They're.. adorable..?
I tried to breed a slime at home once,
but the whole bottle just melted...
And I had to clean it up.
Roi! That's the reason why girls don't like you! You're so petty!
You two seem very close!
Says who!
Why is he examining that slime so carefully?
Kasel has finally discovered how charming slimes can be!!
The weapons embedded in the slime... I was checking to see if they belonged to our knights or to another expedition from Orvel.
Thankfully, they do not.
You misread the mood here, Cleo.
Oh no. I apologize if I embarrassed you.
That's right, Miss Cleo. Kasel was just a little worried.....
See, Roi?
Hah... I guess this time it was me.
It's all right, Mr. Roi. I guess you said it out of consideration for Kasel's feelings.
I'm fine. It might be better if I treat Cleo the way you guys do.
Excuse me? What did I do?
At this rate, this argument will never end. Are you done observing the slime, Kasel?
Yes. I am ready now.
What kind of slime is that?
It's a giant slime!
I've never seen a slime that big before.
I really want to keep it!
Roi, could you please bring that slime back to the Tower of the Sage later?
Nope.
It looks like we will have to get rid of it before we can go any further.
Then let's slash it down.
Don't kill it, Roi!
I don't think he's listening..
Humph! Stupid Roi!
Roi, you idiot! Why did you kill it!?
Hmm. Just as I expected. Slimes are a little hard to cut.
Oh. I'm sorry, Cleo.
Is this also your first time seeing such an enormous slime, Miss Cleo and Mr. Roi?
Yeah! Who in the world created...
such an enormous slime?
Perhaps, the rumors...
What rumors?
Oh, the one about the demons having appeared again?
Have you heard the rumors, too, Cleo?
Briefly at Orvel.
I could've heard more if that stupid Roi hadn't chased after me.
I never knew such rumors were being spread.
If the rumors are true, I doubt the demons would be wasting their time making slime...
The slime might not have been made by anyone.
They could have been affected by the magic and grown big on their own.
Whatever the case, this is abnormal.
I hope everything is okay with Clause...
Eww, gross! Why are there spiders in a place like this?
How can you say that about spiders when you love slime so much?
You're so unpredictable.
They're gross!
Look at those legs!
And those eyes too!
Those bloodsucking spiders are quite good when they're cooked!
You eat those things?!
Uh, you've never tried them before?
This is the first time I've heard they're edible.
My teacher used to make me barbecued spider legs after our training sessions.
Teacher?
Um, we should talk later.
I think those spiders have spotted us.
Don't you dare come closer! I'll burn you all!
There's quite a lot of them. Be careful, everyone.
Are you really gonna eat them...
Ewww! There are too many!
I should burn them all at once!
Yay! Good riddance!
You almost burned us, too.
She doesn't know how to control herself...
But that was great!
All those spiders at once...
Kasel, watch out!
Kasel! Kasel!
Eek! A spider THAT BIG?!
Luckily, he just passed out. He should be okay.
It's not really my style to be out in front, but I guess I don't have a choice.
Not bad for a spider.
Let's see if it can still get me.
Amazing! He's dodging all of its attacks!
Roi may not look like much, but
he's pretty well-known at the Tower of the Sage.
If you have time for chitchat, can you help me?
Urgh! There's no end to them.
Let's see if you can still get me!
Amazing! He's dodging all the attacks!
Roi may not look like much,
but he's pretty well-known at the Tower of Sage.
If you have time for chitchat, can you help me?
Amazing, Mr. Roi. Where did you learn those flashy moves?
Well, let's just say I picked up a little here and there.
Kasel, did you say you had a teacher? What kind of person was he?
His name was Brian. He used to be Captain of the Royal Guards.
Used to be? That's past tense.
Was he fired?
He passed away.
Oh, I'm sorry.
It's okay.
How did it happen?
It's okay. My teacher Brian was...
He was murdered by a group of assassins.
Assassins...?!
I still can't forget that day.
Those bastards in white masks...!
One day I'll find him and... !
Kasel, calm down.
I'm sorry...
Brian was like a father to me.
He taught me that hatred will only destroy me, but...
I've still got a long way to go.
No, you're doing well, Kasel.
Haha. I got a bit worked up there, but it's all in the past. Come on. Let's go, shall we?
Let's go, Frey.
Yes. Roi and Cleo, let's get going!
Roi...
Roi, the assassins Kasel mentioned earlier must be...
... Yes, they were probably the Laughing Masks.
Just as I thought...
Hey, you so look serious. What are you talking about?
Oh, nothing. Hee hee hee.
Huh?
Look! Mushrooms!
Please don't overcook them this time, Cleo!
Huh? Y-yes! Let this Archmage take care of those mushrooms! Hahaha!
They summon thorns from the ground and inflict damage in a wide area. Don't let your guard down.
Well noted. I'll keep that in mind.
No, just well done...
Are you thinking to eat those Muhrooms, too?
Argh, those thorny muhrooms...
The others might get sucked into the attack...
I should draw their attention!
Kasel! So reckless!
If I do this, their attacks won't hurt other people!
Kasel! You were too reckless just now! Why did you jump into the Muhrooms like that?
I thought it was the only way to keep everyone safe.
Still, that was very dangerous!
Frey, what Kasel did was very appropriate for the situation.
We could have been the ones lying on the ground if he hadn't done that.
But he could have had himself killed!
Situations like this occur frequently in a real battle.
Don't you think you're treating Kasel like a kid?
I can't help but worry...
Don't worry, Frey. I'm pretty sturdy, you know.
Look who's talking. Those Muhrooms just kicked your butt.
We're all safe and sound now. That's what matters.
Hahaha. He seems alright. Otherwise, he wouldn't talk that way.
Ah, I don't see any monsters to fight anymore. Let's get going.
Ugh, poison!
I can block it!
Huh? How are you going to do that?
I've never been able to do it before, but...
I heard that I can create a shield if I focus my divine powers.
It worked!
Wow, I feel much better...
Thank you, Frey!
That was amazing.
It's time for me to do my part!
Frey, that was awesome!
I didn't know whether this would work, either.
I never thought to create magic shields using divine powers.
Humph! I was good, too!
See? Look at those toasted muhrooms!
Oh, no, you burnt them again...
Ewww, don't show it to me!
Kasel, you can't shove things like that into a lady's face.
Muhrooms taste better than they look...
By the way, Kasel,
were you there when your teacher was assassinated?
Yes. Brian hid me in the closet before it happened.
There was nothing I could do but hide when the assassins killed him.
So sad...
He protected me.
I wouldn't be alive today if they knew there was a witness.
But, why did they come after Brian?
I don't know. No one had a grudge against him.
And the Captain of the Royal Guards is not one to be targeted easily...
What are you thinking about, Roi?
... Ah, I just remembered something. The leader of the Laughing Masks mentioned it during the executive meeting.
It was something about the guard captain of Orvel and his young pupil.
I don't know all the details since I wasn't involved in that.. but..
Then, there's nothing to worry about, is there? You didn't kill Kasel's master yourself.
That doesn't change the fact that I used to be one of them.
But...!
Roi, Cleo, is everything okay?
Ah, Kasel...
You two were here for quite some time. I just came by to see if everything's alright.
You seem troubled, both of you... Are you feeling okay?
Ah, n-no, we're alright. I was just saying maybe I overused mana today.
Hush. Be quiet.
I know you are there! Show yourself!
Keen as always.
I never thought you'd be traveling with that kid, Roi.
That mask is...
What's wrong, Kasel?
It's them! The white-masked assassins that killed my master!
Speak of the devil, huh...?
Roi, do you happen to know them?
Well, well, well, Roi. You haven't told your friends about your identity yet?
Ah, that's right! An assassin is not supposed to reveal his true identity.
Not until your mission to kill them has been completed. Hehehe...
An assassin?! What are you talking about?!
You still don't get it, do you, kid?
Roi was once one of us, the Laughing Masks!
Is this true? Roi!
What on earth happened to you, Roi?
You used to be called the 'Dark Reaper,' but now you're babysitting these punk kids.
Get to the point. Are you here to execute me for leaving?
I'd be happy to do it right now, but...
Unfortunately, today's goal is to see to that punk knight, not you.
Me?
An assassination order for Kasel?
Hmph, I don't have anything to tell for someone who's about to die.
Here he comes!
It looks like your skills haven't rusted yet, Roi.
You'll need another century before you can beat Roi! Humph!
You did all this just because of an apprentice knight.
Talk. What was the order? Why are you after Kasel?
Now, Roi. You know better than that. The Laughing Masks don't answer questions.
Of course, there is no way you would talk.
Then, I will have to force you to!
Keh heh... Let's spare that talk for some other time, shall we?
See you again, kiddos!
Stop!
Don't go after him, Kasel. It might be a trap.
Don't you dare stop me! Do you even know how I felt when I lost him? He was like a father to me!
You were one of them after all!
Then I will stop you, Kasel. You can't go!
I can't let you put yourself in danger either. If you want to go, you will have to take me down too!
I'm sorry for what I said, Roi. That came out before I...
You're no fun, Kasel! Just throw those facts at his face like you were doing so moments ago!
Haha... Could you please forget that part?
Nope. I was rather relieved.
I had nothing to do with the death of your teacher, Brian.
But I felt guilty for being related to the group that killed him.
What I said was too harsh... forgive me for what I said, Roi. My anger got the best of me.
But...
... Anyone would do and say the same. You lost an important person in your life.
Maybe I had nothing to do with his death,
but the truth doesn't change. I was one of those scumbags who hurt people for their own selfish reasons.
What kind of a group is the Laughing Masks?
Consider them a typical group of assassins.
They take requests and kill people. They have a lot to hide.
Do they have something like a secret hiding place?
... They move their bases regularly to make it difficult to track them down.
I know a place where I trained when I was young, but as far as I know, it's just an abandoned house now.
but I never went out, so I still don't know where it's located.
I see.
Sorry I can't help you.
They will come back, won't they?
They will. They don't let their prey live for long.
Umm... I have something to ask you, Roi.
You seem to have lived as an assassin since you were young. Why did you leave the Laughing Masks?
And how did you become Cleo's escort?
Those are some pretty big questions.
I'm sorry if you feel like I'm interrogating you, but I don't think I can trust you that easily.
After all, you were, at one point, one of the people who were trying to kill Kasel.
So, I need to know what kind of person you are.
... I can't go into all of the details.
Like most who deal in the shadows, they have secrets, ones they don't want others to know about.
You can't expect them to give you a hearty farewell party when you leave, can you?
I was branded a traitor. They chased me and attacked me for countless nights...
That was when Dominics, Cleo's master, helped me out.
Dominics the Great Sage!
Do you know him?
He's a great sage who once was a court wizard. I heard he's been living quietly at the Tower of Sage.
Humph! That old man is nothing great compared to me!
Not that I've ever beaten him, but...
So, Dominics saved my life, and I decided to pay him back.
Though I have no idea how that oath became an order to look after this tomboy.
Who's a tomboy?
Haha!
I'm not a tomboy!
Okay, stubborn lady.
Roi!
Hahaha....
Why would the Laughing Masks come after me?
Perhaps... Was it me that they were trying to kill that day when Brian died?
If it was, Brian was... Because of me...
No, it can't be... That can't be right...
Huh? Aren't those goblins?
Strange. This place doesn't seem like where goblins would choose to live.
I agree. They normally don't step outside of their territory. I wonder why they're here.
They normally do not step outside of their territory. I wonder why they're here.
The goblins may have seen the expedition. Could you go ask them, Frey?
Wait. Goblins don't take it nicely when someone bigger than them approaches.
I advise you not to make an approach so carelessly.
Haha, don't you worry.
It's true that Goblins are sensitive,
but I don't think they'll harm us unless we attack them first.
They will not fear a priestess from the Lua Order.
Hmm. The Lua Order must have a lot of free time to show such mercy to goblins.
Miss Cleo, goblins are precious children of the Goddess Lua, too.
You shouldn't speak so thoughtlessly.
Wow, you seem to know a lot about goblins.
I ran into them quite a few times when I was doing relief activities back in the day.
Please wait here.
Hello, goblin friends! Can I ask you a que-
Humans? Argh! Humans! Humans disrespect us!
Oh, the mood seems pretty sour here.
We no scared anymore! We show you we strong!
Kyaaa!
Get your hands off Frey!
Soft...
Is that where you rest your head?
What are you waiting for, you two? Aren't you going to fight back!?
Such silly thoughts! I need to snap out of it.
I-I'm coming! Hi-yah!
Oh! A stronger hi-yah than the usual!! Get rid of them all, Kasel!
Or was that a hi-yah to hide his embarrassment...
Okay. So much for Frey thinking goblins are the precious children of Lua.
That was pretty wild, Frey.
Those who attack travelers for no reason deserve to be punished!
Something's wrong. They're usually not this aggressive.
The situation is difficult to understand, for sure.
If goblins are this aggressive, they could've attacked the troops, too.
That's a possibility.
But I doubt an expedition made up of Orvelian Royal Knights would have been defeated by goblins.
Of course.
However, the real problem is..
If those goblins keep rampaging about,
it's only a matter of time before they trample and erase all the traces of the expedition.
No way..!
And what remaining traces may belong to the goblins, not the Expedition.
Then, the only way to be sure is to ask the goblins, right?
What, Frey? Are you still thinking about talking to the goblins after all we've been through?
It's inappropriate to assume every goblin is bad.
We should try to talk first, and then use force if things don't work out.
I mean, we can tie them up with ropes and get them to talk.
and drag the truth out of them in time one way or another!
You're smiling while saying that..? How creepy..
Well, that doesn't seem like a bad idea.
Shall we go? I hope the next goblin we meet is a nice one.
That'll be good for the goblin, too.
They look like they are ready to fight. I guess we'll have to go into the hard way.
It's too bad we didn't get to meet a nice one.
I guess we can't ask questions during the battle, right?
No, we will have to subdue all the small ones, and then interrogate the boss!
It would've been great if we could lower our weapons and talk this through,
but that doesn't seem to be the case.
Let's clear the area first. Then we can find the one that we can talk to.
Great. Shall we begin?
Hmm.. They're unexpectedly well equipped.
Goblins are goblins though!
I see some kind of light over there!
Are those... flames?
Could there be a goblin that uses fire magic?
How rude! You just compared my fire magic to that crap!
I doubt it. It looks like a flame coming out of a machine.
Come to think of it, my old goblin friend liked to meddle with machinery.
who also liked to play with machines.
A goblin friend, huh? It's surprising that you made friends with a goblin.
Let's say that it was a rare occasion.
That's awesome!
What's so great about machines like that one?
They smell greasy, make noises... To top it all, they're dirty!
I think it's called 'preferences'.
Can I use one of those, too?
I don't want one, but I am curious about its structure.
I can see that they're not going to let us just through.
Can I use one of those, too?
I don't want one, but I am curious about its structure.
My fire is much more amazing than that crap!
I will blast them all to dust!
Wait, Miss Cleo! We must catch them alive!
Damn! It's hot!
That fire is annoying...
Kasel! Knock that one down!
My dagger is no good, but I think your broad sword should do the trick.
Ok, I got it!
Whew! Now we can catch our breath.
No, not yet!
The goblins will start shooting fire again when they get up.
Then you can knock him down every time?
I can't do this every so often...
Kasel!
I got you!
Kyak!
Have you encountered an expedition group recently?
Expedition group? What that?
I think 'expedition group' is probably too difficult for the goblins to understand.
How should I put it.. like a group of humans wearing steel armor?
Armed humans? I saw! They head east!
Are you sure?
No lie! Truth!
Huh? You mean your battle formation wasn't ready?
Kyak!
I guess you're right.
Why did you attack us?
Humans. Ignore. Reject us.
We stronger now. Ach, no run more from humans!
Kingdom! Ack, take over!
Gas full, take now!!
Urgh!
Kekekekek!!
That little monster!
Kasel, are you okay?
I'm okay. So, I guess the goblins and expedition never clashed into each other.
Well, I don't know about now though.
The goblins are wreaking havoc all over the area. There's going to be an encounter sooner or later.
Clause...
Don't worry. Frey.
As clumsy as he may seem, he is known as the 'Knight of Iron Defense' among the Royal Knights.
Ho! He's that good?
Yes, I'm concerned about the others of the group though.
We should hurry.
Mr. Roi. Did you say you had a goblin friend?
Kind of, yes.
Heh heh! A goblin friend. That's unusual.
They probably became friends because Roi looks like a goblin!.
So, you became friendly with slimes because you look like one, too?
Roi!
Hahaha.
He was peculiar indeed, even among goblins.
As a goblin with albino-white skin, he was shunned by the other goblins.
I rescued him once, when he was being chased by the others. That was the start of our friendship.
Wow! It's surprising to see that Roi cares about others.
You... how many times have I saved you?
I saved you, Roi!
Hah!
Haha. Do you still see that goblin friend of yours?
No, it's been a while since I've seen him.
He locked himself away to make a custom hand cannon, Lakrak MK-1 or something,
and hasn't been seen since.
You seem to remember the name clearly enough.
Huh? Do you hear explosions?
Could it be the expedition fighting the goblins?
Let's go find out, Kasel.
Okay! Let's go right away!
It's that way!
Huh? What's that over there?
Umm... A white goblin?
Who, you!? Why steal my prey!?
Prey?
Who interfere will pay! Ach! Blow up all!
Hmm? Lakrak?
Huh? You know my name?
Ach, no matter! All you blow up!!
I just remembered. He was always like this...
Kyak! Stop, stop! Ach, sorry!
You, what! Ach, you why so strong!
Heh, you still shoot first and think later, don't you, Lakrak?
Eyak? Roi?
Yes. It's been a while.
Why don't you fix that full-steam-ahead tunnel vision of yours?
Kya, kyak! Long time, no see, Roi!
Ewww! A goblin...
Is this your goblin friend you were talking about earlier?
Yes. His name is Lakrak.
He was alienated from the rest of the goblins because of his white skin.
We became friends after I saved him from getting bullied.
Wow! It's surprising to hear about Roi caring for others.
You... Do you have any idea how many times I saved your life?
Kya kyak! You with bullet I shoot, but you okay, ach!!
Ach, tough ones I like!!
Being sturdy doesn't mean bullets are not painful, but okay...
Anyway, why were you fighting here?
I test new weapon and some goblins attack me! So, I test my new weapon on them!
So, that was the reason..
And today! Ach! Shoot Goblins! Shoot humans!!
Good result, ach!!
Hahaha..
Gunpowder more I need! Fix I go!
Hey!
Later see you!! Ach!
He's gone.
Yeah, he was always like that.
I was flustered by his attack when we were only trying to rescue him.
Yeah, yeah! Such a rude goblin!
I'll apologize in his stead. I'm sorry.
Since everyone is okay, that should be fine, right?
I'm not okay, but...
Still! I definitely hate goblins!
Why don't we take a break for a while? Seems like everyone is exhausted.
Everyone seems pretty exhausted.
Agreed. I see some tough-looking goblins ahead of us.
It'd be wise for us to get some rest and regroup.
Great. I feel a little bit tired from all the fighting.
Then, let's take a break and move again.
Hmm? I think I hear a familiar voice.
You do? I can't hear it since it's so noisy in front of us.
Kya kyakyak! My custom hand cannon, Lakrak MK-1! Ach, how taste?!!
Kyak! You, Lakrak! Ach, Why here?
You bother me! Taste my new weapon!
That's definitely the Lakrak we met yesterday.
So, the guards were lax because of this guy.
Can't we just slip away while they're fighting?
He's doing a great job fighting them all by himself!
But we can't pretend we didn't see him. We have to help him.
Huh? Kasel, I think that goblin over there might be the leader.
He's wearing different armor, and he's a lot bigger than others!
He must be controlling this area.
I don't think Lakrak can handle him alone.
Eeeek. Do we really have to go?
Then why don't you just wait for those goblins who are running this way to capture you.
Fine, I'm coming!!
Kyak! Again you, steal prey! Ach!!
We were just passing by.
Go pass by, ach!!
That one mine!
Kekek, who you catch?!
Kyak! Marrik!
This time only, him you catch!! Kyak!!
Not because you're afraid of him?
Kyak! Lakrak no afraid!!
My cannon power, show you!!
Kyak! Your cannon, block with shield!!
What you do, ach!! Front go stand!!
I told you we should just leave...
I know. We should've listened to you.
Come, kyak!!
Kyak! Master Bodakka...
Kyak! I get!!
No, it was me who got him!
No! No! Me! Cannon exploded and...!
That's not true! It was MY FLAME that exploded last and...!
Great conversation...
Well, we can move forward now so that's good for us.
By the way, he mentioned Boddakka just now...
Marrik! Who Bodakka!
Bodakka who is?
Kyak! You I know no know him!
A great goblin Bodakka, ach! Dark Lord power!
True boss. Him lead us!!
Nonsense! I no heard that name before!
Liar!
Yakyak! Cannon put away! Truth tell ach!!
Master Bodakka true leader! Kyak! He unite us!
Unite one strong tribe! Ach!!
Tell us more about how he gained the power of the Dark Lord!
Bodakka strong! Very strong! Only Dark Lord make you so strong!
So, Bodakka the Dark Lord!! Ach!
That's not even worth listening to.
Kyakyak! Bodakka you all---!!
Shut up ach!
Enough test today. I go now! Yak!
See later! Ach!
Lakrak!
Another disruptive departure.
A goblin Dark Lord~!? It can't be true!! Hahahaha!!
Well, I think it's true that Bodakka is their leader.
part of what he said could be true
that Bodakka is leading the goblins.
If we put him down, the goblins here might scatter.
Then, all we have to do is to find the expedition group and capture the goblin, Bodakka!
You say it like it's nothing.
Well, what do you expect of someone on the same level as a goblin.
I'm not!
Kasel, look!
A temple in a place like this?
I've never heard of any temples around here.
A temple that even a priestess has never heard of? Hmm.
Let's go check that place out. We may find some clues about the expedition.
What is this place..?
I have no idea. I didn't know this temple existed.
This place is the Hall of Heroes, a place where only true heroes may enter.
Wow!
My name is Hillia, the one who awaits for someone who would become a hero in the future..
I am waiting for a hero who would face the darkness inside and emerge victorious.
Only those who win the battle against their own darkness mayst become heroes.
Face the darkness inside and emerge victorious...?
You must be... Kasel.
H-how do you know my name?
The path is one of hardship...
To continue your journey, you must overcome this ordeal.
And, Kasel.
Uh, how do you know my name?
Thou shouldst pass this ordeal now.
Where thou art headed is full of hardships.
A path of hardships... Iris the Great Priestess clearly advised me...
to protect him from succumbing to darkness.
Are you prepared to meet your challenge and become a hero?
I'm a little busy right now...
No, Kasel. You must do it now.
Huh? But the expedition...
If Kasel overcomes this ordeal, will you shed light on his path?
Of course. Frey, the priestess who follows the path of light.
What am I supposed to do?
You must enter the Room of Ordeals in the Hall of Heroes.
To open the Room of Ordeals, each hero needs fragments that fit them.
When you submit the required number of fragments, the Room of Ordeals will open,
and you will face the darkness inside of you.
Kasel, you have defeated your own darkness.
Yes. I suppressed the horrible thing, and this thing came out.
Now, you must take it to the Room of Purification.
When you purify the darkness, you will finally awaken
and gain another light.
T-this power is...
What's it like? Is it really that amazing?
Yes. I feel so much stronger!
Can I do it, too, Hillia?
Of course, Child of Fire.
All who open the door with the correct amount of fragments shall face the darkness within them.
You can make your magic stronger by overcoming the ordeal.
Where can I get the fragments from?
What do you think money is for?
Excuse me?
My apologies. A ghostly spirit just invaded my mouth, so I had to exorcise it.
You can find fragments in special places all over the world.
You will discover them one by one during your journey.
And, Kasel.
The one you're looking for and the one that's looking for you are both at the World Tree.
The World Tree?
We have to go north to get to the World Tree!
Let's hurry!
Thank you, Hillia.
See you soon! I'll come back when I've collected my fragments to purify my darkness, too!
There are two ways to getting to the World Tree.
The north and the west...
What is the distance?
Similar.
Then, we should go west. For some reason, the goblins are gathering to the north.
If we want to reach the World Tree quickly, it's be better to deal with fewer enemies, even though it makes me nervous.
Cool. Then let's head to north.
Hiyaa!
Urk... You're pretty strong for a human!
You're pretty good for a child!
Clause!
Clause!
Kasel?
What are you doing here?
Where are all the other members of the expedition!? Why are you fighting alone!?
All the other humans ran away.
What?!
Hmm, I don't recall inviting this little kid knight!
Step back, Kasel!
Even Frey is here..
Who is this old woman!
Oh, my... We've got too many uninvited guests. I'll have to do put some of you down.
Too many uninvited guests.
Don't ruin our fun. We're having a good time.
I guess I need to clean up some of this mess.
Damn it, Kasel!
Run!
You can't beat her!
Where are you looking at, knight?
I'm the one you want!
Damn it.. at this rate...
Those two, they're not like any other enemies we've fought before.
What should I do? At this rate, Clause is..
No! I can't lose him here!
Frey, Cleo, and Roi... Please lend me your strength.
This will be a tough battle, but please, I need your help.
I need to save Clause!
Well said, Kasel! Who else other than this archmage will help you when you're in trouble?
Clause is family to me as well. I won't let him get hurt!
Gah, escorting this tomboy is a lot more tiring than I ever expected.
Be careful. Like Kasel said, they're quite strong.
The four of you kids are going to stand against me? How adorable~
Okay, children. I'll play along. Just don't die too quickly, okay?
Argh!
Kasel, no!
Oh, is that it? I was just starting to get excited.
Stand up, children. You can do better than this, can't you?
Gah... R-run way, everyone. I'll stop her..!
Don't be ridiculous! How can I leave you when you can't even stand up!
I haven't seen anything this powerful... Is this the power of demons?
Pull yourself together, Cleo!
Do you want to die here?
Tsk, this is boring. I was a fool to think I could have a little fun out of this.
I'm bored now, kids. Now die.
And don't blame me too much, okay? Fufufu!
No... I can't give up like this...
Clause... Everyone I dragged into this... I must protect them with my life!
Even if I die here, I have to stop them!
Can't let them die. Have to get up... even if it kills me!
Wh-what is this?
Some energy is coming from the deep down inside..
I can feel it...
An immense power that I've never felt before!
That sword is...!
Oh no...
This kid...!
Maria!
Move out of the way, knight!
Yikes!!
Are you all right, Maria!
I'm fine, Morrah.
Hmph, I've discovered something unexpected and interesting.
Let's back off for today. It's going to be even more entertaining from now on...
Are you running away?
Not exactly 'running away'.. but we will let you live this time.
We will meet again soon.
We may even join forces, who knows?
Don't make me laugh! Who'd be your ally, hag?
Hey, wizard chick. I really should thank you.
You reminded me of an old friend of mine who used to cast fire magic.
The memory of my old friend who was a fire sorceress just like yourself.
Even so, I thought about killing you...
For now, I'll let you live. Live until you meet me, again.
Next time we meet, you'll either have to join me or die.
See you later. Ahahaha..
Wait! Hey you! You hag!
Tell me more.. I want to hear more about it...
Ugh...
Are you all right, Kasel?
Huh! Clause? You're still alive!
What about Frey? Are Cleo and Roi okay, too?
I'm here.
We owe you our lives, too, Kasel.
What about the witch and the servant demon girl?
They ran away.
What! Are you sure!? You guys are awesome!!
You're so strong, Clause, Cleo, Roi!!
Frey sure did her best, as our only priestess!
I feel pathetic, being the only one to pass out.
What are you talking about, Kasel? You saved all of us.
Excuse me?
Don't you remember? It was awesome!! The sword started to shine, even though it was just for a moment.
And you defeated two powerful demons with only a few attacks.
And the sword changed its appearance before we realized it.
Is it over..?
Kasel, you were amazing! You dominated those two like it was nothing!
There was a flash of light every time you swung your sword! It was like a bolt of lightning.
By the way, Kasel, since when did you attain that power?
Flash of light? Power? What are you talking about, Clause?
What do you mean? Don't you remember what you did when you fought off the witch?
I... All I was thinking was that I had to save everyone.
Then, I felt something surging inside me. After that... I don't remember.
I should say.. I was feeling... dazed? Like I was doing what that energy was leading me to do.
Speaking of which, you're now holding a different sword as well.
Oh? This sword is..
Wait a minute. T-this can't be...
The Holy Sword Aea?
Yes! That is the Holy Sword Aea, the one that defeated the Dark Lord Angmund long ago!
Wow!
Wh-what?
Oops! I was so excited I jumped out of nowhere!
Sorry. I am the World Tree Fairy, Rhill.
A World Tree Fairy? I mean, what is this Holy Sword doing in my hands?
Of course, it's there because it chose you.
Huh? I believe that last owner of the Holy Sword was Kyle, a warrior king that lived 100 years ago.
Because it belongs to you.
No, the holy sword belongs to King Kyle....
Kyle was also the one chosen by the holy sword, ever since he was born.
Then... that means Kasel was also...
Yes. Kasel was also fated to be with the holy sword.
I'm just an apprentice knight. I could never dream of living the same destiny as King Kyle...
The holy sword first emerged during the time of King Kyle, when the demons raided into the world.
There is no evidence that it only chooses kings.
That's right. I also do not know how the holy sword chooses its master.
As the World Tree Fairy, all I've been doing is watching over this sealed holy sword.
But the holy sword in front of you is not whole, yet.
Before King Kyle's companions sealed the holy sword inside the World Tree,
they shared the power of Lua that was imbued in the holy sword.
You have to collect this power, and return it to the holy sword.
You should meet the Elves at Elidora Forest first.
So, what you are saying Kasel is, he needs the power of the holy sword?
Yes. The fact that the holy sword revealed itself after being sealed for a long time means
it realizes the world is in need of its power.
That means...the holy sword must have had various masters before me.
It just had no reason to reveal itself.
In other words, the holy sword existed even before the time of king Kyle,
but it may have only revealed itself to protect the world from the demons.
Certainly sounds plausible.
Fate. I don't like this subject.
Anyway, I don't see Cleo. Where has she gone?
Ah, the kid has her own issues, too.
Then, let's go to find her.
I will have to thank her for the time we spent.
No, you don't need to do that.
Kasel and Frey have to help us from now on.
Hah. Not us. You mean just you.
I heard your story.
Considering that witch has some business with you...
I will stick around with you.
You need to see her again?
Hah... It's going to take forever explaining. Can we go for a short walk?
I also don't know how the Holy Sword chooses its master.
As the World Tree Fairy, all I've been doing was watching over this sealed Holy Sword.
The Holy Sword is unstable now, though.
It's because Kyle and his comrades shared its power before sealing it away.
You will have to find the scattered power of the Holy Sword to make it complete.
Go to Elidora Forest. There, you will learn what you'll have to do.
Since the Holy Sword has chosen Kasel as its master, there's no backing out now, huh?
After its long sleep, the Holy Sword has finally appeared.
This means that it knows when it's needed, and who it belongs to.
(I.. called for the power of the Holy Sword..? I just wanted to keep everyone safe...)
What do you say, Kasel?
Destiny or not, what really matters is what you decide to do from now on.
I-I'm not sure. This is happening all too fast...
Yeah, I feel you.. it's a lot to take in.
You should think carefully before making a decision.
Thank you for your kind words...
By the way, is everything okay with Cleo? She hasn't been looking so well for some time.
Umm...
Wake up now, Cleo. The witch is gone.
I know...
I don't think you do. It's not like you to get stuck in the past.
Feeling so down over the past... You're letting down all the people who know you as a tomboy.
Roi, you!
Hahaha. That's the Cleo everyone knows.
Shut up!
You'll meet the witch again, sooner than you think.
She said that she'd come for us. There's no need to fret over it.
Hmph!
*Giggle* Even though you talk that way to Cleo, you really seem to care a lot about her.
*Sigh* Like I said before, that's a joke I never want to hear again.
Same here. I'll burn your mouth with magic!
Hahaha!
Umm... Roi, Cleo. Thank you for helping me, then. I really appreciate it.
You helped me meet Clause again.
Thank you. You've done a lot for my little brother and sister.
There is no need for you to thank us.
That witch had some deep interest in you. I think I'll hang around you a little longer.
Huh? What do you mean?
... I don't even know anymore...
So, Cleo is looking for her mother,
and the witch seemed to know about her mother,
and now, she wants to be with me to see the witch again.
Then, do you want this sword, Cleo?
Oh! Oh! Are you sure? If I may, I'm sure I can collect the power of the holy sword much faster than you!
Kasel! You can't hand off your holy sword to anyone!
The holy sword will not give its strength to anyone but its chosen master.
Humph! What a petty sword.
Hahaha! Funny little girl!
Little girl?! I'll have you know I am a great sorceress from the Tower of the Sage!
The Holy Sword Aea is not like other weapons.
It grows stronger when the owner becomes stronger.
Excuse me? Is this rude knight coming with us?
Hahaha. I apologize, little sorceress.
I have something I need to do, too.
So, Cleo is looking for her mother,
and the witch seemed to know something about her?
Right. It happens that the witch is after you,
so it'll be easier for us to meet that witch again if I stick with you.
... I haven't decided what I should do yet.
I'll have to do something when she shows up again, but...
Argh, come on, Kasel! Stop being so indecisive and make up your mind.
Whether you like it or not, the witch will come back. You can't be so wishy-washy now.
Cut it out, Cleo. It's Kasel's decision.
But...
Cleo.
... Tsk. Okay, okay. I got it!
Hahaha, two trusted comrades, taking good care of Kasel! As a brother, I'm glad for you!
Hmph! What are you so happy about?
Well now, lady. Don't be so harsh on him. Kasel only came here to see if his brother was fine.
However, he now has to decide whether he'll have to become the master of the Holy Sword or not. Anyone would be confused in this situation.
I know that! I'm just frustrated...
Hahaha, okay, little lady.
Don't you call me little lady! I'm the archmage of the Tower of Sage, Cleo!
Understood, little wizard.
I said I'm an archmage!
Calm down, Cleo. And you too, Clause.
Hahaha, I'm sorry.
Anyway... I think it's time we get back to business.
You mean the leader of the goblins?
It's always best to nip the problem in the bud.
Well said.
I'll join you, Clause.
As a knight, I can't let goblins hurt people.
Ooh, you've really grown!
Okay, we'll finish this off quickly!
So are you going to capture the goblin boss that is taking over King's Plains?
Kasel. You have a smart companion.
People who are a bit dense like yourself need smart friends.
No, I'm his smartest AND strongest companion!
Hahaha. I understand, little sorceress.
You keep adding 'little' every time you refer to me! Little!
Do you want see what the fire of a great sorceress can do to you?!
Miss Cleo, throwing fire over such a trivial topic isn't a good idea.
Oh, uh...that's true.
Damn goblins! I, the great sorceress, will rain fire on you.
Clause?
Frey. You're up, too.
Are you here for Kasel? Did the Great Priestess send you?
How did you know?
The Great Priestess visited me the night before the expedition left.
She knew we were headed in this direction, so she asked me to protect the World Tree.
Was that the reason you were fighting alone while everyone else was running away?
I couldn't just let the demons bring chaos into our world like this.
To tell you the truth, we were ordered to fall back when the witch attacked us.
But... I just couldn't.
Yes.. She said the same words to me, too. She said I would face hardships with him
and that I had to help him on his journey so he would not sink into the darkness.
A path of hardships.
I had this feeling that I would lose people that I care about
if I failed to keep the World Tree safe.
Then, I realized that might have been the reason why the Great Priestess told me to protect the World Tree.
By people that you care about, you mean...
Surprisingly, Kasel was one of the first to come to mind.
Of course, you, Grandpa, and all the brothers and sisters mean the world to me.
But strangely, I had this image of Kasel stuck in my mind that time... I couldn't think about anyone else.
Clause...
Hah. When she asked me to protect the World Tree,
I thought I might be the one that the Holy Sword would choose as its master.
I never expected Kasel would be the one to shoulder such a heavy burden...
I never expected it would be a burden for Kasel to shoulder.
If I had known, I would've just followed the order to retreat.
No, You did well, Clause.
You did what you were supposed to do with the guidance of Lua.
Haha. You've become a true priestess, Frey.
I know this isn't something I should say in front of a priestess like you, Frey,
but I am quite resentful that the goddess burdened Kasel with such hardship.
There will be another battle tomorrow. Let's go inside, Frey.
Well, anyway. Bodakka, was it? The leader of the goblins?
Once we get rid of him and the goblins are no longer a threat,
I will return to Orvel.
Take care of Kasel while I'm gone.
Don't worry.
I am Lua's chosen one.
I'll do my best to protect Kasel from succumbing to darkness.
The defense seems tight here, more than elsewhere.
This looks like the Goblins' base.
So, is Bodakka here?
I heard this goblin Bodakka runs around on a boar.
If that's a fact, it might be easier for us to spot him among the others.
Really? That sounds like fun! I want to meet him quickly!!
Where did you get all this information?
It's a method... that I wouldn't share with a priestess.
We got rid of their leader. They won't be a threat to us for a while.
No, wait.
Doesn't it look like the ones that were scattered are all gathering in one place?
What?
Hmm... There must still be something that's uniting the goblins as one.
Let's try to think positively.
They may end up showing us what they're hiding.
I hope that is the case, but...
Let's move. We can see what this is all about,
and decide what to do with them later.
Well.. Doesn't sound bad.
All right. Then, let's move.
Kasel, didn't we sense this feeling before?
Yes... It's oddly familiar...
Right! It's similar to what I felt in the Hall of Heroes!
That's right! It's like when we opened the Door of Ordeals!
But there's something different about it.
If the Door of Ordeals was a big, flat piece of glass,
this place feels like it has small pieces of glass scattered all over it.
Small pieces of glass...
Ah! Could this be what Hillia mentioned before?
She said fragments could be found in special places of the world.
If we have a chance, let's check if there really are fragments in this place.
Good idea.
Apparently we can find the fragments we need for the awakening here.
We should say our good-byes here, Kasel.
We've finished off Bodakka and found where the gunpowder storage is located.
I have to go back to the capital and hand in my report.
Oh! I had something to finish in Orvel, too.
That stupid Roi messed up all my plans as soon as I arrived in Orvel...
Then we can go together. We should hurry.
Wait, are you going to leave without this great sorceress?
There must be another way ...
Oh, Miss Cleo! Do you mean you can open a portal?
Portal?
Hah! Totally!! We can get back to where we were in no time!
We should really say goodbye, Kasel.
It was so good to see you return safely.
We came home together, but now it's your turn to leave.
I can't help the fact that I was chosen to do this. I know I have to go.
I will join you as soon as I finish things here.
Sounds like the Knighthood is more liberal than I thought.
Well, if not, I can submit a request to be dispatched.
If all else fails, I can just drop out of the knighthood.
That's another liberty to be able to drop out anytime anywhere.
Wait, didn't you say Kasel is a squire?
Well, nothing has been posted for the squires for 10 days after the expedition left.
Oh, that's right. I need to go through the process of resigning my knighthood.
We are affiliated with the Royal Knights. We can take care of that at the palace.
Now I'm going to the barracks.
Take care of yourself till we meet again, Kasel.
And, don't tell anyone about the holy sword.
I know. Rumors of the holy sword's resurrection will make the rounds in a jiffy.
It can put Orvel in danger, too.
That's my brother. You are very considerate.
All right. Roi!... And the archmage, Cleo!
Please look after Kasel and Frey while I'm away.
Hmm. Suddenly I'm a 'great sorceress' when somebody needs my help!
Haha, did I say that? Hahah.
Fufufu.
Time to go. See you later.
That day...
I clearly remember that day,
when nightmarish creatures attacked the village.
I came to realize later that those creatures were Demons.
Like all other villagers that day,
my parents too, had their lives taken away by those Demons.
I can't recall it well, but I was running into the village.
And I witnessed my mom slowly losing her consciousness from outside the door.
I was so scared and shocked that I couldn't go closer to her.
My mom then saw me, and slowly shambled toward me.
Only then did I cry, bursting loudly into tears.
She grabbed my hands,
and led me to the loft.
She then distorted a dimension with her hand gestures.
She pushed me in there, and my memory ends there.
Before pushing me into that dimension,
she definitely said something to me.
Maybe I was out of my mind with fear.. I still don't recall her words to this day.
But there's one thing I clearly remember...
It's her face when she bid me goodbye...
When you go to the Northeast, you will be able to meet the elf druid who possesses part of the holy sword's power.
Eh!? Since when were you following us?
When I saw you headed towards the Elidora Forest at the World Tree,
I rushed here to guide you.
I can't stray too far from the World Tree. I can direct you only a little further.
First, go straight to the East.
This forest is bigger than I had expected. Wish there's some kind of a milestone...
Rill, Rhill or whatever that fairy's name was, I think it lied to us.
I'm not seeing any 'clear' path here. All I see are trees and weeds.
Hmm? I'm seeing a road to the north.
Look at this, a flat pathway. Not bad.
What's so special about a flat pathway?
This could mean that a lot of animals and people stroll on it.
Ohhh, does that mean this could be a legit path?
Pretty much.
Still, we should be careful.
It's risky to let our guard down when we don't know anything about this area yet.
Is that.. a ghost...?
This is odd. We had a pack of wolves attacking us, and now even ghosts...
You're right. I don't sense any irregular magical power from them though..
Watch out, Kasel. Physical Attacks are of no use against that spectral wolf.
Oh no. Then I have no means to
Hehe~ Don't worry. Ghosts are nothing to the archmage like me! Let me care of them!
Ehehehe...
Feels like I'm the one stuck with drawing the short straw...
No, you're not!
I'm telling you again, the holy sword belongs to you, Kasel.
I wonder if you have considered the efforts of a fairy trying to safekeep something that isn't even theirs.
I didn't want the sword to begin with..
Be proud yourself!
The Holy Sword Aea is a gift to humanity from the goddess, Lua.
Yes! I want one too! My own, unique weapon!
Oh, right.
There was an old old saying that other unique weapons beside the holy sword exist.
You might find your own unique weapon someday, Cleo!
Really?? Then you should have said so earlier! I didn't know that!
That's only if you are a world saving hero, Cleo.
Hah, Kasel has his unique weapon! Why can't this great sorceress have one?!
Let's search for it together if possible!
Everyone, please take care!
May the blessings of Goddess Lua be with you.
Look, dryads! Wow, I've never seen one before, except in books!
Dryad?
They're the sentinels of Elidora Forest.
They are known to be kind and generous to everyone.
Wait, something's not right.
W-what did I just see? Did it just kill one of their own?
Uh-oh, it spotted us. Looks like we are next.
What's going on here...?
Discussion later. Let's deal with them first.
Brace yourselves! They're coming!
Dryads would never say such words!!
What should we do?
We are in danger, Cleo.
It's my duty to keep you safe. I can't back off from this fight.
The rest of you take care of yourselves.
Then we'll just have to help each other!
Look, a wounded dryad over there! I think it's still alive...
Hold on, it could be a trap.
Trap or not, I have to help. As a priest, I cannot let someone die in pain.
Are you alright? Please hang in there. Let me heal
D-don't... It's hopeless, give up on me...
E-elidora Forest is... already corrupted... by darkness.
M-many of us in here... are being c-controlled by... the darkness...
No... NO!!!
She's dead...
Being dominated by dark power? Could that mean...
What is it? Is there anything you know of?
I've heard of mind controls, a mean to control beasts such as lions and wolves.
But I didn't expect the same thing would work on the noble intellectual beings such as dryads.
What are you talking about?
I may be wrong, but I think it's one of the mind control magics that Demons use.
I'm pretty sure I'm right. That dryad said 'controlled by the darkness.'
Demons... Perhaps it's a deed of that witch we saw last time?
That, I'm not too sure. So far, I haven't sensed her magic power.
Then who...
Kasel, why don't we step back for now? I think it'd be too dangerous to go further.
Especially if that magic is strong enough to corrupt intellectual beings such as dryads,
controlling humans like us would be a cakewalk.
I agree that this place is dangerous, but that's a hasty decision.
It's not like this place is fully shrouded in darkness that we can't even breathe.
We've only faced packs of wolves and dryads. That's all.
After going through all the troubles, we've finally managed to find the correct path. Why should we step back now?
I'm afraid I can't accept your decision.
I'm sorry, but if Kasel gets corrupted by the darkness...
Err... Cleo? How about you? What are your thoughts?
I did sense power of darkness from the dryad's dead body.
Other than that, I didn't sense any other ominous energy.
If that's the case.. let's keep moving.
Kasel!
Frey, I know what you're worried about, but I must move on.
If Elidora Forest is truly being corrupted by the darkness,
all the lives of this forest will suffer more and more as time goes.
I believe it's my duty to end this suffering.
But...
I'll be fine as long as I have you.
I have someone who was sent by the Great Priestess. Nothing could possibly go wrong.
Heh, I couldn't have said it better myself.
Totally.
Okay... Then promise me that you'll be cautious at all times.
Like I said before, the power of darkness that lurks within this forest is very dangerous.
I will. Don't worry, Frey.
Look at that. That's um... Ents! Looks like they aren't corrupted by the power of darkness.
But they look very angry. I don't think we can pass through here easily.
How dare you defile this holy ground! You shall all be punished for what you've done!
They must be thinking that we're the cause of the problem. We must clear up the misunderstanding somehow!
They seem very agitated. Talks aren't enough to solve this problem.
But...!
As you can see, they are considering us as enemies.
Careless approach will only exacerbate the situation.
They're angry at the sudden spread of corruption.
If battle is inevitable, there will be no choice.
But let's first try to find an ent who's willing to talk.
Hmm.. That sounds like a high-risk gamble to me.
I would prefer not to put Cleo in danger as much as possible.
Yeah right. Since when did you ever worry about me?
*Sigh* Yeah.. it was foolish of me to even start worrying about you.
Anyways, about finding an ent who's open to a talk... I don't think it's possible to check all of them.
Since all of them are out their minds, my suggestion would be to subdue them first.
Sounds good. Then, let's try to knock them out instead of killing.
Roger that.
This is bad.
No matter how many times we put them down, they get back up. There's no end to this.
Ugh, my fire magic would easily finish them. Too bad they're not monsters.
No fire magic this time, Cleo!
That would possibly cause a huge forest fire, then all the creatures in the forest would definitely become our foes.
I know, I know... But it's just so frustrating!
Only if these ents would listen to us...
Halt!
Ah, Selene, the Princess of Elves!
Princess... of Elves?
Please be at ease, strong-rooted ent friends, for they are not your enemies.
What are you saying, Princess Selene?
For days we have searched Elidora Forest thoroughly,
and these beings were the ones with the most outlandish look.
If it's not them, then who might be the ones behind all this?
Lady Lorraine has found the culprit.
Everything will soon be under control. Now then, please calm yourselves.
The Great Sage has said that? If so, that's a relief!
(The Great Sage...?)
Hey uh, sorry for interrupting, but...
It was really intense a while ago. You ents badly misunderstood us.
Oh, we sincerely apologize for it.
It could have escalated to the point of no return. Please accept our sincerest apology.
Yeah, right! An apology after asking for one! I bet you guys didn't even bother trying to figure out who we were!
Hey Cleo, I know how you feel, but let's listen to their side of the story first.
We don't have a single clue as to what's going on here, and why the ents acted that way.
Roi is right. They could have approached us with less violence, but that's probably because they care much about this forest.
Also, I believe they can tell us about their troubles. Let's hear them out first, alright?
Tsk, whatever!
I do not know the whole story, but it seems our ents have caused you quite a bit of trouble.
It's ok. We're fine after all.
By the way, you mentioned that you now know the culprit behind all this. Were you talking about the darkness that engulfed this forest?
How did you...? I thought this was not yet known to the outsiders.
Oh, that's...
I see... So even the dryads have now fallen to the darkness...
Would you mind telling us what's going on in detail?
Now that we know the situation, we can help you out if you need our assistance.
Hold on, that's not what we should be worrying about. We don't have time for such matters.
Remember what Rhill said before? Rhill said that we'll find our next destination in the Elidora Forest.
And the ent mentioned something about the 'Great Sage.'
I assume that person knows something about the Holy Sword.
Oh, so your plan is to help them in return for information about the sword?
Yes. I think it's better to get their help than helplessly wandering around.
Why don't we just help, then get help from those who know this place well?
Wow~ you're right! That's smart.
Sounds like a plan to me. I'm in.
Eh, Roi? You heard all that?
You can say that I'm always all ears.
S-sure...
Thank you for your kind words, but I don't think we are desperate enough to seek aid of the out
I'm sure whatever trouble you are having can be solved quicker with our help.
Two is always better than one.
Hmm...
Looks like you don't trust us.
No, it's not like that at all.
Ok then, how about I take you all to the Great Sage for the detailed story? Please follow me.
I, Selene, the Princess of the Elves, have just returned.
These travelers here offered to aid us, so I guided them here.
Please introduce yourselves to our revered druid, Lorraine.
A druid? For real?
It is an honor to meet you.
I am Kasel from Orvelia.
Welcome, travelers.
The successor of the Holy Sword and his companions... We have valuable guests with us today.
How did you know...?
Wow! Are all druids that awesome?! She already knows everything!
That's because I felt the Holy Sword's energy resonating, that's all.
Something I've been keeping for the last hundred years just recognized its master.
The Holy Sword? Lorraine, I do not quite understand this situation.
Your highness, Kasel here is the successor of the Holy Sword.
I can feel Lua's light surrounding this man.
W-what have I!
Forgive me for not recognizing you! I, Selene, the Princess of the Elves, humbly welcome you to our land.
P-please don't. I'm just an ordinary squire.
No, you are the noble one, chosen by Lua..
You are the hero who will save us all. The least I can do is to honor your presence.
I-I really don't deserve this...
By the way, you just said that you have something that you've 'been keeping for the last hundred years.'
Is this related to the Holy Sword?
Hmm? Oh, you must be talking about this.
This is a portion of the Holy Sword's power.
We had our reasons to divide the Holy Sword's power 100 years ago.
Normally, I would have given back the power the moment the new master appears.
But I'm afraid I can't at the moment.
Pardon me, the Great Sage, but what exactly is going on here?
Could you share with us the details of the current situation?
The Lake of Eternity was the place where the ritual to separate the Holy Sword's power was carried out.
The source of mana that upholds Elidora Forest lies in that lake.
Recently, a powerful dark energy engulfed the whole lake,
and since that day, the dark energy started corrupting the forest's lifeforms one by one.
I believe someone intentionally planted the Core of Darkness deep inside the lake.
The culprit seems to have left long ago, however.
So that's the reason why gentle dryads turned so violent.
Those who are more sensitive to magic are the ones to be greatly influenced. It is a tragedy...
If what you're saying is true, then aren't all your elves in danger as well?
We elves are safe, thanks to the magic barrier cast by Lorraine.
If we are struck by a being corrupted by the power of darkness however, we too, will become corrupted.
How can we help?
We will go to the Lake of Eternity. There, I want you to help us destroy the Core of Darkness.
The Core of Darkness... is it something we can easily destroy?
We do not know how they planted the Core of Darkness inside the lake,
but there was no news of Demons appearing near the lake yet.
If we get there quickly, we should be able to destroy the core with ease.
Hmm... Anything else we have to worry about?
The Lake of Eternity is in harpy's territory. To enter the lake, we must first get permission from the harpies.
But that is not the matter you should be worried about. We elves are on good terms with harpies.
But the Core of Darkness is emitting darkness powerful enough to corrupt those who are kind at heart.
We can't just go to there without a plan
That you do not have to worry about.
Haaa!
This is...!
This barrier will protect you from the power of darkness.
Dear Great Sage, thank you.
Let's move. We should destroy the core before it corrupts more beings.
Is she coming with us?
While you destroy the Nucleus of Darkness, I have relief responsibilities to handle.
I need a proper foothold for this.
Could you prescribe something for us so we are not affected by the Nucleus of Darkness?
Of course. Let's get ready to leave.
Look, dryads. I think they're being hostile to us...
They also must have been corrupted by the power of darkness.
We can't revert them while they are conscious.
I'm afraid we will have to neutralize them to proceed.
I guess we have no choice. Ok then.
Our paths will separate here. I will find the corrupted ones and heal them.
Your highness, you should go with them to destroy the core.
As you wish, Lorraine.
Successor of the Holy Sword, please take good care of our princess.
I will. Dear Great Sage, please take good care of yourself as well.
I must be dreaming... An adventure with the warrior of the Holy Sword.
I am truly honored to be with you, my warrior.
Haha... I, um...
Err... Frey?
Hmm?
Are you okay with that? I think our little Elven Princess has quite a crush on Kasel.
Is she...? I think she's just showing respect as he's the warrior of the Holy Sword.
Well if you say so, and I hope that's true. I don't want any drama here.
Love between an elf and a human... Ugh, worst drama ever.
It would be very hard for the couple to overcome the lifespan difference.
Also... Love stories of an elf and a human usually end tragically...
Uh, Frey?
Hey, are you ok? Something bothering you?
Oh... No, it's nothing.
Come on, let's get moving. They're already over there.
Okay.
Now the ents too? Watch out, my warrior. The power of darkness is growing stronger.
Now you mention it... I think the power's getting thick enough that it's hard to breathe.
Goddess Lua, please save these lost and fallen ones with your hand of salvation...
They're coming. Brace yourselves!
It's impossible for me to address a princess so casually.
Then can we be friends, too?
Since we are companions to the Knight.
Of course. Make yourself comfortable when you talk to me, please.
Okay, Selene. Nice to meet you.
We are now in the harpy's territory.
Fortunately, the harpies seem unaffected by the darkness.
Greetings, brave harpy warrior. I am Selene, the Princess of the Elves.
As it happens, we have an important matter to settle in your territory. We would very much appreciate your cooperation.
Understood, noble Princess of the Elves.
But on one condition. We would like you to give us the Holy Sword.
What?
Huhhh? Are you kidding?! No way!
If you deny, then we will have to resort to force.
What did you just say?
Hey, you chicken-bird! Stop talking nonsense and show some respect, will ya?
We are here to destroy the Core of Darkness planted inside the lake! We are here to help you guys!
W-what?! Kid, say that again!
How dare an outsider insult the proud harpy warrior! Know your place!
I, Naila, will teach you a lesson!
What?! Is this chicken-bird serious? Who do you think I am?
Bring it on! I'm going to crush you so hard that you will cry for mercy!
Um, Roi? I think Cleo is quite inflamed.
Yeah.. Tell me about it
Argh...
Come on, is that all you've got? That was too easy.
You picked the wrong person to mess with. An archmage like myself is too much for you to... Eh?
W-what are you doing, Roi?
Let me ask you one thing. How did you know that he has the Holy Sword?
And what do you intend to do with the Holy Sword?
It was an order from my queen. She told us that we need the Holy Sword to solve the matter.
She also told us that the successor of the Holy Sword is someone who carries a breeze purer than anyone else,
therefore it'd be easy for us to find him.
So you knew it by sensing his wind.
Sensing my wind? What does that mean?
Harpies have an innate ability that allows them to sense the energy of the wind.
Not only does this ability enables them to predict enemy's movement during the battle,
but also allows them to instinctively sense changes in weather, and baleful omens.
No wonder. I was surprised that she easily found out that I have the Holy Sword.
Next question. Why is Queen Balalaika after the sword? Why would she need the sword?
Please help us, Princess Selene. All our kin is going mad.
It seems the Core of Darkness... is now corrupting harpies as well.
Let us hurry. We should go to the Lake of Eternity at once.
Are you... helping us?
I believe your name was.. Naila? Please guide us to the Lake of Eternity.
Thank you... Thank you so much! I Naila, the harpy warrior, will never forget your deed!
Princess Selene, do you have a minute?
Why? What's the matter?
Relax. I just want to ask you a few questions, nothing more.
