He's a wizard that uses the fire of hell, and he's very powerful.
He was an adviser to a special unit made up of only Draconics during the Demon War.
Oh? A wizard that uses fire.
Wh-what?
Why are you looking at me like that?
Roi, is it because my magic doesn't work on Draconics!?
Hm? I didn't say anything.
I'm just wondering who is more skilled with fire magic, between you and Infira.
You shouldn't compare me to a Demon!
Ha ha, humans are funny.
Looking at human friends is always an interesting thing to do.
Right?
They go really well together.
No!!!
By the way, Laias, you're... different earlier. What was that...?
I felt overpowered...
Oh, sorry. Ha ha...
I showed some of my dragon nature to provoke the Draconics.
It wasn't as strong as when I'm in a dragon form, but I released it just enough for them to lose their reason.
I wasn't able to control my power completely, though.
And I spoke like my old self... Hahaha. Sorry for showing you that.
Ahahaha....
Northwest Dwarf ruins... Enemy... found.
Five humans including the wielder of the Holy Sword... One Dwarf... One dragon.
Dragon... cannot be captured...
Hmph. Weakling.
So the ruins in the northwest.
So they want to use the traps set by the Dwarves to stop ground forces, and to keep away the Draconics.
I can see through it. Bweh heh... They are all weaklings anyway, except for the Priestess of Water.
Dragons wouldn't kill each other so easily.
Go, Temeraire! Go on a rampage, kill them, and destroy everything!!
Kwaaaaaaah!!!
Hm... I thought they would send some Draconics a few times at least...
But they sent Temeraire right away.
Infira really likes to use overwhelming force.
Yanne, you have the location?
Yes, I've arrived.
I can shoot anytime!
Okay, we're counting on you.
Now, let's make an opening for Yanne to shoot!
Now, Yanne!
Leave it to me!
Take this!!
*Huff...* Did we succeed?
*Coughs* I'm not sure yet.
Don't let your guard down!
Temeraire...
Temeraire, my old friend.
You've lost all reason, and even your soul is filled with anger and madness.
But it's okay. Just go to sleep now.
Once you rest for a long time... Everything will be better...
Bweh heh heh... Bwahahaha!!
Found you, Laias!
Y-you're...
You're not Temeraire.
Bweh heh heh, you got half the answer right.
This is the body of your old friend, Temeraire.
But its mind is under my control!
Infira...
It was you.
Ha ha, the great Blue Dragon knows me. What an honor.
Oh. I did fight your siblings.
I could've killed Neraxis last time, but I didn't get to.
Bwahahaha!
You're using a curse to control his mind...
Hm. I have no other choice.
Hm? Hey!
Hey! Wait! Don't ignore me!
Hey!!!!
Yanne. We'll have to change plans.
Could you regroup with us?
Okay. I'll be there!
The purging didn't work?
It worked... But it wasn't regular mind control.
He was using a curse to directly take his mind and take over his body.
A curse!?
I'm not sure how Infira gained that power...
But we'll have to immobilize Temeraire now.
Everyone, do your best!
Kuh, you dare ignore me!?
Don't think you'll die without suffering first, trash!
Trample them, Temeraire!
Kwaaaaaaah!!!
Kuh, the heat from the breath...!
We have to endure it!
Fortunately, we have Laias's magic,
but we won't last long...!
Again, again, again!
Why is everyone here resistant to fire!?
My magic isn't working!!
Well, it's a volcano... and it's the Red Dragon, so isn't it obvious?
I know, Roi, you idiot!!
It's not like you're doing much, either, Roi!
Well, my dagger'll do nothing to that big body.
But I can keep the rocks and boulders from hitting you.
Yaaah! I'm mad, too! I wanna do something!
If it wasn't for Laias's shield and Pavel's frost, it would've been dangerous.
Anyway, the only ones who can even hurt that monster are...
Yanne and Laias.
Laias, you won't turn into a dragon?
If I turn into a dragon in a place like this, you'll be in danger too.
I think it will be safer if I fight in this form.
But I don't think we'll be able to defeat him like this.
Alright, I have an idea.
It's a gamble, though...!
Kuh! This is a dragon... Every attack from it is just too strong!
The shield is reaching its limit, too...!
Just a bit more!
We just have to lure him over there!
The volcano monsters are in the way!
Wow, a lava golem!
Roi...
This isn't the time, Cleo!
I'll bust through them! Haaa!
Bwahahaha, there's no use in resisting!
No matter what you do, you can't win against me!!
If you want to win, you should reveal your true dragon form!!
And then, the humans around you will all die.
Bwa ha ha ha!!!
Alright. Now!
Everyone, get down and be careful!
Bwahahaha, this is all you could come up with?
There's no way the arrows of a Dwarf would penetrate Temeraire's scales!
Hm? Where's Laias...!?
Get off.
Kyaaaak!!!
Kuh. Was the trap a fake...?
Hmpf, this attack doesn't even hurt... Hm?
That's the signal. Do it, Cleo!
Finally... Finally it's time for this archmage to shine!
I'll bury you, you red lizard!!!
Kwaaaah!?
Ignorant buffoons! What are you doing!?
Ha ha, these ruins were made by ancient Dwarves.
They carved out a mountain and set up all these traps and devices.
But if none of the traps work...
There's this left.
Kuh, I'll kill you, you little cretin!
All I have to do is get away...!
Impossible. As long as your wings and body are under that many rocks,
not even a dragon will be able to leave easily.
Hmph. Don't make me laugh!!!!
Kuh, this is!?
You melted the rocks...!
You think you can stop me with this!?
I'll kill you first, pipsqueak!
We don't have time. We need to remove the curse now!
The Holy Sword should be able to do that.
But getting near Temeraire while he's like that is...!
No, Kasel! It's too dangerous!
But if I don't do it...!
Kasel, that sword...
Will its power work even if it's away from you?
What? Oh, I never tried, but...!
Alright. Let's give it a try!
Come here!
Now, take a deep breath, and pull the string.
Kasel: Hrgh...! This bow...!
Kasel: So heavy... And the string is so tight...
Kasel: Yanne, you wielded something like this so easily...!
Yanne: Hahaha. Well, if anything, I have confidence in my strength.
Yanne: Don't think about anything else. Focus on the Holy Sword, and control its power.
Yanne: I'll help you with the aiming and shooting.
Focus... Focus...
Holy Sword... Goddess...
Grant me the power to get through this...!
Kasel: Now, Yanne!
Yanne: Alright! Fire----!!!!
Kwaaa!!! Die, you trash!
Gugh!?
This is... the Holy Sword!
No! My power... The power that he gave me...!!!
Kwaaahhh!!!
It's finally over... *Sigh.* That fight was just too much.
I didn't think he would be able to move under that pile of rocks...
By the way, Yanne. It was a great idea to use the Holy Sword like an arrow.
Hahaha. Well, it's not the first time I did it.
I've used swords and spears to shoot with my bow before.
Well, they don't fly as well as arrows...
Maybe because it's the Holy Sword? It felt different from when I shoot a regular sword.
Hahaha... I'm glad no one's seriously hurt.
It's because you protected us from the front, Phillop.
Hahaha, thanks for saying that.
Frey, Frey, did you watch me fight?
I did well, huh!? Didn't I?
Yes, Cleo. You were great.
You get so big-headed... Hahaha.
You felt so down because your attacks weren't working earlier.
Wh-who said I was down!?
Eek! Idiot! That idiot, Roi!
Hey, that hurts. C'mon, don't hit me.
We succeeded in making Temeraire fall asleep.
It won't last long since it's an artificial slumber, though...
As long as no one wakes him up, he will sleep for over 10 years.
Hahaha... 10 years...
Kasel, did you find the Holy Sword?
Oh, yes. Actually...
When I went to Temeraire to look for the Holy Sword,
it appeared in front of me from the sky.
Just like when it first came to me...
Oh, how interesting.
I guess that's proof that you were chosen as the master of the Holy Sword?

Kwaaaaah!!!

Morrah.

!!! Everyone, look over there!

my... father...?

Of course, you must feel angered... But it is not time yet.
Malduk, if you say so...
I'll do as you say.
But...
There won't be a next time.
Father... Huh...
King's Raid
Pandemonium
Are you... angels?
Think what you want.
We are beings that only exist to serve Lua.
Thank you.
Do not be mistaken. We did not save you.
We were only concerned about the Holy Sword.
Human, you may have been chosen by Lua.
But you must never fight Dark Lord Kyle, not when your power is this weak.
I can't argue against that.
His power was truly great.
Hmph, if the Holy Sword was complete, things would have been different.
...The completed Holy Sword...
You are also a convict who has turned away from Lua.
You may live for now, but you will receive judgment soon.
Who gave you the right!?
Even if you have assimilated with the soul of the Holy Dragon, you are still an inferior dragon.
Know your place.
Enough.
Who are you, anyway?
I am Frey, a priestess from the Church of Lua.
A religious group that believes in the goddess... and wields her power.
Yes, we follow Lua and use her powers to create a better world.
No, I'm not talking to you.
You may be looking for an opportunity while hiding in there, but you will not succeed.
What? I don't understand.
Enough. We have delayed for too long, Arch.
Very well.
We will take down the Dark Lord.
So, do not try to challenge him again. You're just not strong enough.
Master of the Holy Sword.
If this is the will of Lua, we must follow it.
However, human beings are too unpredictable.
Do not act so recklessly, as you have done last time.
Don't act so recklessly? Come on!
Bleh! Snobs!
Lua's... dogs...
Anyway, this is the Swamps of Gargoss.
And...
Kasel.
Are you all right?
You're the kid with the Holy Sword.
Those angels were right. I don't understand why you acted so recklessly.
Hey, we helped you!
I knew it was rash of me to do that, but I couldn't just ignore someone in trouble.
...Hmph.
So, you did it for me? Hah! You're the Master of the Holy Sword.
And you risked losing the Holy Sword because of your sympathy?
Hah hah... This is exactly why I can't trust so-called heroes...
Hey!
That's enough. Regardless of what happened, we risked our lives for you.
We're not asking for gratitude, but you are being very rude. You've crossed the line.
Kasel.
Maria, the Holy Sword's power must be very important.
Well, that doesn't matter to me.
If I was holding back in fear of losing the Holy Sword...
And if I had been fighting while worrying about things like that, I wouldn't have stepped up to save you this time.
It's not the Holy Sword itself that's important.
It's my heart and will that matters. I've come to realize that traveling with everyone.
Yes, I am only able to keep going because of all of you.
Thank you, everyone.
Maria.
I'm very glad... to have you by my side.
Hey, where are you going!?
There's something over there that can neutralize Dark Lord Kyle's powers.
And my goal is to find it to complete the power of the rift.
A power that can... neutralize Dark Lord Kyle's powers?
That place is...
It's the ruins of the Ancient Kingdom. It's also the Dark Lord's Castle where Kyle and Dark Lord Angmund fought their final battle.
The Dark Lord's Castle...
Let's move.
Kasel.
There is a clue over there. And a solution.
You actually believe that woman?
Whether we can trust her or not doesn't matter.
If there's any chance I can take, then I'll have to take it.
Yes, I agree with you.
Okay. But Frey, I want you to stay right next to me! I'll protect you.
Thank you, Cleo.
Hmph, are we done talking now?
You'll find out soon enough how ugly Lua truly is.
That's why I'm taking you all with me. Just to show you the truth.
I'm definitely going to throw a fireball at that woman later...
Kasel, do you have a moment?
Yes?
I've been trying to tell you for a while, but I just couldn't find the right moment.
What did you want to tell me?
Back at the Snowy Mountain, I...
I'm sorry. No matter how dire the situation was, I should've acted more carefully.
Roi...
Please forgive me for only apologizing now, after making you suffer through all that.
You don't have to do that, Roi.
I was so flustered and confused at the time.
And I just can't get my mother out of my head after that day.
Honestly, it's been so painful.
That might be the reason why I've never brought it up.
But I had a feeling that you wanted to talk about this for a while, Roi.
Kasel... I knew I should have said something back then...
No...
I should be the one to apologize.
I knew that Frey and Cleo were also avoiding the subject.
I knew that everyone's been suffering because of this...
But I was too afraid to talk about it. Even when I knew that ignoring this would make things even more difficult for you all.
Kasel...
Thank you..
for bringing up a difficult conversation..
and for apologizing first.
You might think I'm weird for taking this so calmly.
But I decided to accept it.
My mother already passed away...
when she chose to sacrifice herself to get me out of that village during my childhood.
So, it's fine now.
Kasel...
You don't have to blame yourself.
The bigger problem right now is him.
King Kyle...
Kasel's father...
Back at Snow Mountain, I talked with Pavel about my mother.
About what kind of person he knew her as... and her relationship with him...
I learned some new information, though they're in bits and pieces.
He didn't tell me too many details.
It seemed like he was hesitant to tell me some of the stories because of the truths we learned back at the Volcano.
And that's why... I have a different view about her now.
You mean that woman? Maria?
She was one of the heroes that fought alongside King Kyle... The Saintess of Brilliance.
I'm still not really sure whether or not she's actually the same person.
But in the end, it is true that her actions have helped us out.
What Malduk said really hit me hard.
I can't believe she's done all that behind the scenes...
I still don't like it! Did you forget already?
She never gave us a straight answer and kept luring us into traps.
She relied on and admired Kyle more than anyone else.
Just like Frey, who's unafraid of sacrificing herself for you.
Let's just wait it out. I'm sure she has her reasons.
Frey?
Huh?
What's wrong? You seem a bit out of it.
Ah, was I?
She's probably just a bit tired!
And this place is so creepy... It looks like it's haunted.
Ah hah hah, can we not talk about ghosts?
I hope this isn't another trap.
Are you sure there's something here?
I mean, it's shady enough that this place contains some power related to the Dimension Rift.
Everything you say is just so hard to believe!
Hey, lady! Say something!
Stop babbling like a child. If you're that creeped out, you can just turn back.
Why you...!
And how do you know my mom?
Why do you keep asking me about your mother?
Uggh...
Morrah!?
I-I'm fine...
This wound...
Is it from the Black Knight?
I knew something was wrong when you were knocked away from that hit.
Shut up, you inferior fools.
What!? Hey!
Cleo, stop it.
...Why didn't you say anything?
You don't have to worry.
Lua, my Lord...
Why...?
The two of you definitely don't get along with us. However, I am a priestess of Lua.
I can't just ignore someone with such a terrible wound.
I insisted that I couldn't heal Naila's sister because she was possessed too strongly by the demonic power.
However, because of my own shortcoming immaturity, that left a scar in Naila.
I promised to myself I'd never act like such a hypocrite again.
...Even if I have to sacrifice my own life.
Don't say that! You already did something like that back at Snow Mountain!
I also feel terrible whenever I think of that moment...
Yes, you say that you were just keeping your cool, but you should also be careful not to show unconditional mercy to your enemies.
What happened to Naila was unfortunate...
But you're right.
Himmullis, was it? That harpy was already tainted by the darkness.
Just like the Queen of Harpies.
If you had healed her out of sympathy, you would have been put in a more difficult situation.
No, even so, I should have still healed her.
Regrets don't change anything... But...
You're trying to move forward by facing them...
Maria...
Anyways, thank you.
Morrah, are you okay now?
...Yes, I feel a lot better now. But...
But?
N-No, never mind.
(Is it just my imagination?)
Father...
You've changed.
Yes...
If we keep going like this, and with Maria's powers... we could...
No, unless the Holy Sword is complete, it would be futile to fight against him.
Don't cry, Maria...
Please take care of her...
Welcome the coming of a new, beautiful age with everyone...
Become... their hope.
Kyle...
He... failed... even with the completed Holy Sword...
Be careful, everyone! This one is different!
Watch out, Frey!
Ahh!
Haa!
Raven Storm!
Now!
Haaaa!
Ah...
We need to admit that Kasel's power is much stronger than before.
He is completely different from what he was like at the Volcano.
Is it really possible to get that much stronger, just by changing your attitude?
The Holy Sword is an artifact that follows its master's will. As Kasel's heart grows stronger, the Holy Sword will get stronger as well.
Oh, that's right... The fairy at the World Tree said something like that before. Well, as long as the Holy Sword is completed, that Dark Lord dude is done for!
I mean, Mr. Dark Lord? What am I supposed to call him? He's Kasel's father...
Well, it looks like the angels weren't lying about the Holy Sword's incredible power once it's completed.
It can even make the Dark Lord look like a joke.
We just need one more Holy Sword fragment, right?
Yes, Kaulah has the last fragment.
Why don't we go back and look for it now?
No, it looks like Kasel made up his mind.
Even if it's not related to the fight against the Dark Lord, he wants to solve the problem at hand right now.
He's really grown from a glutton he used to be...
...Ah hah hah...
That priestess, Frey...
Something feels off about her.
What do you mean?
When she cured my wounds...
I don't know if all priest healings are like this...
But this weird energy came out from her.
Weird energy? What do you mean?
The energy I felt when I became one with the Holy Dragon. I felt the exact opposite from her power.
A power that opposes Lua...
A demonic power...
Actually.. let's just see what happens for now.
Whew... Looks like everything's taken care of here.
And those two were the ones who did it quickest without leaving anything behind.
They would have definitely been a tough enemy to face...
Hah hah! My dear brother and sister!
Clause!
Clause!
I finally caught up to you!
How did you find us here?
It's not hard to track down someone with the kingdom's help.
Especially, when I'm looking for such a unique group of people that have been walking through remarkable paths.
You guys are!?
Clause, wait!
You're that petty knight from Orvelia.
Kasel... What's going on?
Why are you traveling with those people?
Just calm down and listen to me...
They attacked the Guardian Knights of Orvel.
But you're saying they're not enemies? What do you mean?
Did you forget that you almost died as well back then?
That's true... but things have changed. Just listen.
Clause, lower your sword.
Very well.
Huh? She's...
She must be...
This is Princess Scarlet, the 1st successor in line for the throne of Orvelia.
Princess Scarlet...
I'm telling you now, but do not kneel in front of me.
Oh, um... Okay...
But this is just a very awkward spot to be in...
Yeah... I never knew how hard it would be to not kneel when royalty is before me...
You must be the Warrior of the Holy Sword, Kasel...
I am no hero.
I have come out here to meet you.
But it looks like you'll have to explain this situation first.
He doesn't usually pull out his sword so rashly.
Princess...
She is one of the heroes that fought against Dark Lord Angmund along with King Kyle 100 years ago.
Maria the Saintess of Dragon.
What?
A hero from 100 years ago!?
So, she's the nameless saintess?
The one whose existence the Church of Lua purposely hid?
But...
You once brought peace upon the kingdom by defeating the Dark Lord...
But why did you attack the soldiers of Orvelia?
Hmph, did any of those cowards who ran away from her attack die?
You all worked together to save the World Tree of your own accord to occupy the area.
You never realized that your actions only aggravated the Dark Lord.
That means you would have never realized that she actually saved your lives.
Huh!? Then, she really wasn't trying to kill us back then?
...Think whatever you want.
Very well. Although I did not hear all of the details,
I can already tell that you are not our enemy.
Especially when you are one of the heroes that fought against Dark Lord Angmund along with King Kyle 100 years ago...
But why were you working with the Dark Legion?
I guard the Princess. Move and you will die.
Interesting! A mere human would dare...
...Wait. You're not human.
Stand back, Chase. The Princess is speaking.
Yes, it looks like we have exactly the right thing here for the situation.
Perhaps he predicted this would happen when he handed it over to us...
We brought this.
This is...
It's Aeatola's Talisman.
It's one of the artifacts that holds a portion of the Holy Sword's power.
The Orc Chieftain Kaulah gave it to us, saying that you were going to need this.
You already met with Kaulah?
We followed you here by tracking your path. We ran into a lot of people.
As expected of Mr. Kaulah.
So, this is Aeatola's Talisman...
This is the first time I've seen it.
But we don't know how to fuse the power of the Holy Sword with just this.
Yes... Aeatola...
How did you...?
This should be more than enough to prove yourself.
The ones that divided the power of the Holy Sword should naturally know how to restore it.
That means that your story is holding up to be true.
She's really smart... I guess that's what it takes to be a princess.
Shh.
I have come out here to meet you and find what I lack.
I wish to fight alongside you to hear your stories and learn from them...
Kasel, before you go...
Hmm?
As I told you before, we tracked you down by following your path.
Along the way, we were able to meet with a lot of people. Naila, the leader of the Harpies.
Kaulah, the just and rightful Chieftain of the Orcs.
Epigael and her brother, who gave us a warm greeting, even though they are Dark Elves.
They were especially sad, not being able to follow us to meet you.
We didn't run into Pavel at the Snowy Mountain, but we were lucky enough to talk with the brave Barbarian Gau.
We also met up with Laias and her party, the ones who fought along with you at the Volcano.
Finally, we ran into the King of Dwarves, Phillop, a warrior from 100 years ago.
You really met up with all of them.
Hah hah, I'm glad to hear that they're doing well.
I am really proud of you, Kasel.
I am really, truly, proud of you.
Clause...
The little punk who would always cause trouble back at the orphanage grew up to become the Warrior of the Holy Sword...
On the other hand, I was always upset. I failed to be by your side after giving you such a heavy burden.
I was also worried about whether or not you could handle the responsibility of being the Warrior of the Holy Sword.
But I was wrong.
That's why I'm so thankful.
Clause...
Warrior of the Holy Sword, Kasel, I have seen the path you have walked.
The Warrior who appears to oppose the Dark Lord. The chosen master of the Holy Sword.
It must have been so difficult.
I can't imagine how scary and hard it must have been.
Thank you for overcoming all that hardship to be with me right now.
But Kasel, feel free to lean on me anytime.
If you ever need my help, I'll do everything I can to protect you.
Clause...
It's written on your face.
Hah hah...
That's enough boring, big brother talk.
Frey must be worried about us. Let's get going.
Clause.
Hmm?
Thank you...
Kasel, you don't have to shoulder all the responsibility. Frey and I will always be on your side.
So, we're going with the Princess?
If we go with her party, we can safely say that nothing will stop us from achieving Maria's goals.
Ugh... Still... This is going to be kind of awkward.
But, that buff guy was incredible!
He was literally about to run into Morrah without even blinking!
That's true. Seeing him cut loose like that even made me flinch a little.
One of them is the master and of Orvelia's Guardian Knights that protects the capital, and the other one is next in line for that position.
Some say that the Princess is even stronger than those two.
I shouldn't be saying this, but I'm fairly certain of that.
They're monsters, all of them.
Well, we'll see more of what they can do this time.
Roi was right...
Huh? What do you mean?
About how they're monsters.
I really shouldn't be saying this about a Princess...
Hah hah, but these people really are crazy strong...
I couldn't agree more.
The wind is growing colder.
I only expected darkness and gloom, but it's surprising to see such a beautiful place here.
Countless souls are resting in this place.
We created this place in hopes of helping those souls rest in peace, by blocking off the demonic power.
I've heard a little about you and my father from Pavel.
That stupid Ice Dragon... He said he wasn't going to intervene anymore...
Did you lose all of your powers as a saintess now?
Yes.
But you were once called the Saintess of Brilliance.
Hah hah... A nickname like that is pretty meaningless.
Lua...
To be honest, I despise Lua.
And I also think it's pathetic for all of you to obsess over that Lua.
How much did you hear from Pavel?
The brief meeting between the heroes of the past and my... father...
The fight against the Dark Lord... and the relationship between my mother and your father... but...
He didn't tell me that my father was the Black Knight.
Yes... I suspected as much...
The Holy Sword granted by her... Lua's power.
The one with the fate to defeat the Dark Lord and bring peace to this land.
Yes, the story about Kyle and us is understandable...
But he probably wasn't sure about whether or not you could handle the last part of the story.
Honestly... It was hard to believe it. I'm still feeling confused.
I can honestly understand why Pavel was so hesitant about not telling me the truth.
Yes... Of course... I understand...
He may look cold on the outside, but he is actually very compassionate.
He just doesn't realize it himself.
I'm sure... he's gotten real sick of this world.
After all, the hero who was supposed to bring peace to this world...
turned into another Dark Lord who is trying to destroy this world.
And now his son is destined to carry the Holy Sword once again to kill his father.
King Kyle... No, my father... Why did he become the Black Knight?
I heard that he actually defeated Angmund to bring peace to this world 100 years ago.
But then why... has he turned into the Dark Lord to put an end to us?
Kyle was thoroughly abused.
By that so-called goddess called Lua...
She does not deserve to be called a god.
What kind of a god would abandon the person who sacrificed himself to overcome all of the trials she gave out and complete his ultimate mission?
He too, probably didn't expect you to be the reason why Lua abandoned him.
I was the reason?
What do you mean?
...I hated her.
It didn't matter that I wasn't the one he chose in the end.
I thought I could endure everything as long as he was happy.
There wasn't much I could have done for him as a saintess.
Things would have been different if he had reached out to me,
but I was nothing more than a good comrade to him...
But I was still happy to be by his side...
But everything changed soon after that.
Yes, I started hating someone.
As a saintess, I was not supposed to hate anyone.
But I started hating your mother as soon as I met her.
The woman Kyle once loved so much...
Not only did the two of them become reunited, just like in a fairy tale,
but your mother also filled me with envy and jealousy by choosing the path of love without hesitation. It was something that I wasn't able to do.
Yes, I was the one who wanted to stay by his side the most.
But even if I stayed next to him, I couldn't do anything for him.
Maria...
Kyle kept fighting...
To protect the world...
To protect us...
To protect her...
And to protect you, who was just about to be born...
He fought for everyone...
But thanks to Lua, she transferred our great hero's powers to you before you were even born.
Even after finding out that Kyle could no longer fight against Angmund, he didn't give up.
And in the end, he managed to bring down Dark Lord Angmund by sacrificing his life...
He did it all on his own.
But that sacrifice of his didn't mean anything to Lua.
The 100 years of peace you enjoyed until now... It was nothing more than a false peace.
But the people were convinced that peace has arrived for all eternity.
Lua was praised, and the Warrior of the Holy Sword was praised as the agent of Lua.
Lua?
Lua's blessings!?
Lua's Holy Sword!?
Lua's Warrior!?
No!
That was all Kyle's strength, a mere human!
King Kyle...
He bled out everything he had to desperately bring down Angmund to protect his loved ones!
It was the strength of a single human... It was the strength of Kyle, whom we all loved...
But Lua just threw him out to keep the Holy Sword safe.
Lua abandoned Kyle, who threw away everything to bring the peace the goddess wanted...
And even when Angmund gnawed upon his body, Kyle never dropped his sword until the end!
...Maria.
Whew... I got a bit too agitated...
When I said I wanted to see something out of you all...
It was the sight of you saving Kyle.
I want you to go save him...
My acts may seem twisted... but everything I did was to save Kyle...
Hah hah... It feels embarrassing to let it all out...
It's been a while since I felt like this.
Maybe it's because you're his son... You remind me of him a lot...
Thank you.
For what?
It must have been hard for you to tell me about this...
About my father, my mother, and about you...
Just shut it...
I will save him.
He's turned into this fearsome, dangerous being...
And I have never called him my father, let alone seen him.
But I will do everything I can to save him. I promise.
Please take my hand.
And lead me on the path.
You're such a brat...
Let's go together. Everyone is resting by the fire.
Although everyone is keeping quiet, no one hates you or Morrah.
You're lying...
No, it's just how they are.
They understand suffering. That's why they also understand the pain you're going through.
Come on, let's go. To our friends.
...But I...
I'm very glad... to have you by my side.
What? Are you here to pick a fight again?
You were just worrying about her missing. Be honest, Cleo.
Wh-when did I say that!?
By the way, where did Morrah go? She still has to get some rest.
Gosh... What am I supposed to do with you all?
Hah, you did good work for a brat.
Hah hah... The Warrior of the Holy Sword... Now I'm sure of it...
You're more than worthy of being called a hero.
I don't see the Princess, either. I will go find her.
Just sit and stay there. I don't want you to wander and get lost.
Understood.
You're back.
Was Morrah with you?
Ah, I just had something to check with her.
Together!?
Yes, right?
Oh, r-right.
Well, everyone seems to be enjoying themselves. Did something good happen?
Ahem! We were talking about this archmage's performance at the Dragia Volcano!
The person I've never called my father.
But now I know why you insisted on the path you walked.
I found out why you never laid down your sword,
even though you knew about your death.
I won't hesitate anymore.
Just as you raised your sword without hesitation
to protect your loved ones.
I, too, will raise my sword for the same goal.
I cannot forgive the goddess for what she did.
But if that was not the case, you would have not been able to protect anything.
Father.
I am coming to meet you.
As the dark night skies gave way to the morning,
and everyone prepared to move out to the old Dark Lord's Castle,
Maria told everyone about what she had told Kasel
by the lake on the night before.
Everyone was shocked by the truth... and could not find any words to say.
That's... impossible...
Lua... abandoned her warrior?
And the current Dark Lord is...
King Kyle... the one who saved us from the last Dark Lord?
I can't believe it, even though it's coming from someone who actually experienced it...
And... Kasel is King Kyle's... son?
That means... Kasel... will fight his own father..?
Unbelievable...
Frey?
Ah... I'm sorry... I'm just a bit confused...
That's understandable.
Why would Lua...?
And the Dark Lord corrupted King Kyle's mind, right?
Doesn't that mean the same thing could happen to Kasel?
Is it really even possible to stop that?
Isn't it dangerous to just go in recklessly?
He is unstable at the moment... Even if he was corrupted, he would still be unstable without the completed Holy Sword.
We can't be sure if he would still be at the Dark Lord's Castle, but if he is there...
I doubt that. The Imperial Army visits the place regularly.
The Imperial Army?
They are digging up the artifacts of the Ancient Technomagic Kingdom.
But doesn't this territory belong to the kingdom? Are the Imperial Army allowed to be here?
It's right on the border with the Empire.
And above all... they have been visiting this place ever since we were busy trying to hide this place out of fear.
We jumped into the scene for the dig later on, but we had to face a possible conflict against the Imperial Army.
On top of that, some of the nobles are making backdoor deals with the Empire.
The Empire is just acting out of formality. They probably don't even consider this place as part of our kingdom's territory now...
That's preposterous! And those treasonous nobles are even worse!
When I go to the Empire later, I will definitely demand an answer about this!
Come on, what can you do about a political situation between two nations?
Then, I'll just tell my grandpa!
That's even worse. If he steps up to the plate, it won't just be a spark, he will bring down hell upon these lands.
Grandpa?
Cleo's grandfather is Dominics of the Tower of Sage.
We've been traveling with the granddaughter of such a powerful figure?
He's not my real grandpa. And I'm way stronger than the old man!
I suppose if he really does step up... Never mind, I don't even want to think about it.
The artifacts from Technomagic Kingdom are being treated very carefully by the Tower of Sage as well.
A small energy stone crystal is enough to destroy an entire town, or even reduce a city to dust by accident.
But they're just letting the Empire dig those up?
Do the nobles of Orvelia have no idea how dangerous those are!? Oops!
*Sigh*
It's fine. This is also the fault of the throne for not doing its part.
You didn't say anything wrong.
Though, it was a bit rude.
Demia.
My apologies.
Let's get back on topic.
Maria, you were gathering that power of the rift to stop the Dark Lord's corruption?
Yes. This power, created from the Dimension Rift, is the demonic power of Angmund.
That means it's able to cast away the power of corruption. Morrah and I tested it with our demonic powers.
Even if the demonic power of the Dark Lord is much stronger than ours, it will be hard to pierce through this power.
That is, as long as he doesn't try to self-destruct by sacrificing himself.
Then, we just have to be careful if he tries self-destruction!
That's only if the final object we're looking for is actually in that place.
Let's just hope the Imperial Army isn't there at the moment.
*Sigh* But we still have a long way to go...
Whoaaa! What!?
Red lightning!
What now!?
Did that come from the ruins!?
You don't have to be so impatient. Of course, it could be dangerous, but we just have to prepare ourselves and approach carefully.
Huh? Uh... Right.
He's definitely changed a lot, hasn't he?
That's what you call growth.
Which is what I always want out of you.
Bleh!
The completed Holy Sword. Isn't that thing overpowered?
I can't believe King Kyle lost with that sword.
He didn't lose. He was corrupted.
And towards the end, he lost the power of the Holy Sword and fought as a normal human.
But still.. that power seems unfair!
It's only possible for Kasel to use it now.
Did you forget about what Frey said? As Kasel grows, the Holy Sword grows as well.
Wait... This incredible demonic power...
It doesn't belong to Kyle... It feels different from that... It's too cold...
It just feels like an abyssal wall... but what is this enormous size?
Wh-what's this? It's making my entire body shudder.
Is this related to that red lightning from earlier?
Let's hope not.
That lightning was powerful enough to blow away an entire tower.
If we run into such demonic power, we might go insane.
But we have the Holy Sword!
Yeah! If things go wrong, Kasel can destroy the tower!
Alright, should I try?
Please don't encourage her.
Hah hah...
Once we get past this place, we'll arrive at the entrance to the ruins.
Looks like the Imperial Army is here as expected.
Kasel.
Yes, Your Highness?
Once we go inside the ruins, like it or not, we will run into the Imperial Army.
Before we go inside, I want to try dueling you if it's not too much trouble.
If you're not ready because of the sudden request, we can put it off to a later date.
I think it will be fine.
Clause.
Yes, Your Highness.
Clause, I entrust you to be the witness.
Yes, Your Highness.
Kasel, the Princess is strong. Very strong, actually.
Thank you for your concern. I will try my best not to lose.
Hah, you goof.
If the duel becomes too heated, I will intervene.
Yes, of course.
Please go easy on me.
Whew...
You are strong.
Thank you.
You managed to match my blade, even without using the Holy Sword.
How much of your skill did you use in this duel?
To be honest, it wasn't very hard for me.
Is that so?
I understand.
Is that a hawk screeching?
What's that?
It's a hawk from Orvelia.
Princess!
If it was sent in such a rush, this news must be important.
My father... has fallen.
The King!?
And at the same time, the Chancellor disappeared from the capital.
That treacherous traitor finally revealed himself!
We cannot delay even a moment. We will return to Orvel right away.
Even if we use the portal, Aegina Desert will be the farthest location we will be able to reach.
Then, we will have to procure some scrolls from there.
Scrolls... in the middle of a desert?
Your Highness... I have bad news.
The portal scrolls are not working.
What? The greatest wizards from the capital gathered their mana to create these special long-distance scrolls.
It seems like the demonic energy of this swamp is interfering...
That means it will be impossible to get out of here by using ordinary scrolls.
Then, we'll have to get out of this swamp as soon as possible.
Wait, hold on a second.
Let me handle this!
First, this is yours, Mr. Doggy.
My name Chase. Not Doggy.
It's a nickname! And this is really rare!
Portal scroll? But didn't you just hear?
Portals don't work in this place.
It works.
...Ahem!
Who do you think I am?
I'm already known as a prodigy in the Tower of Sage.
I suppose that does make sense, coming from the granddaughter of Dominics.
No! It's not from my grandpa! This is all my doing!
She fell for that easily.
I agree. Hah hah, it is certainly fun teasing her.
...I'll make sure to prepare a fire needle later.
Don't. If you do something like that to the Princess, you'll be executed for sure.
Whatever. Just give me the scrolls that aren't working.
There, now it's going to work.
Incredible...
Everyone knows about the scroll restrictions, right?
No more than two persons.
It has an absurd crafting cost that an ordinary person could never even think of.
The coordinate accuracy and travel distance based on the mana. Are you talking about them?
And there is also a memorization restriction that prevents mass production.
That portal scroll is filled to the top with my mana. It's the longest scroll you'll ever see!
But it can only send one person at a time.
I only gave Mr. Doggy a separate one because he joined us later.
You cared for me...
I... thank you.
And since I've never been to Orvel,
you'll probably fall inside the forest in front of the city.
Although, the forest should be right in front of the city...
That's more than enough!
Orvelia... requires your aid.
Demia, you are too outspoken.
Hah hah! Now you finally see the real value of this great wizard!
For your information, I can open a portal without a scroll!
That's enough boasting.
Awww, you ruined my moment.
Clause, you may stay behind.
No, I will go back to the capital as well.
Is that okay with you, Kasel?
Of course. When we meet again, I'll become a brother you'll be even more proud of.
The Princess seems to have found an answer from her heart after meeting you.
So, once the situation at the capital is resolved, I will come find you on my own if needed.
I'll be waiting.
Yes, keep Frey safe.
Clause.
I can relax, knowing that you'll be by his side.
Hah hah...
Please take care of him.
Keep safe until we meet again.
Lua's blessings...
Please be safe.
Well, Kasel.
I look forward to sharing more stories with you when we meet again.
Yes, Your Highness. I will return to the kingdom with pride.
Yes, we are counting on you, Warrior of the Holy Sword.
No, you're the warrior carrying all our hopes.
(The Princess has acknowledged you, Kasel...)
Clause happy. But Princess sad.
Shh. It's not like that.
Wh-what's this?
This is literal chaos.
Did a war break out here or something?
It might have something to do with that powerful demonic energy we felt earlier.
Let's assess the situation first.
We should move separately for now.
Morrah and I will focus on the remains of the ruins.
For what?
It's definitely here. The object Maria is looking for.
You mean the thing that's needed for completing the Dimension Rift?
Yes. We've already looked around all of the other places within the kingdom.
We thoroughly searched all of the ruins within the kingdom, except Eastern Empire and the Empire that were out of Dark Lord Angmund's reach.
And now, this is the final place.
We'll meet up again at the old Dark Lord's Castle over there.
Are you sure the two of you will be okay?
Hmph, you kids better watch out. You guys attract too much attention.
...Wh-what?
Let's move.
Don't die on me now.
Morrah... also changed.
The Holy Dragon is probably making up a lot of her personality... Although she talks a bit scary...
Well, now that the real magnets for trouble are gone, we'll be safe.
We should split up into two groups as well.
Yes, that should be safer. Although we can't compare to those two,
we can't deny that we also attract quite a lot of attention as well.
Frey and I will go together to check out this area.
There might be some people who may need our help.
Then, we'll go check out the outskirts.
I can't get that energy from before out of my mind.
And there's also one more thing that's bothering me.
Hmm?
Never mind.
We will go on ahead. Let's meet up later.
Yes. Please be careful, Roi, Cleo.
Shall we go, Frey?
Intruders! Demons!?
No, we are not demons.
Regardless, we were given orders to kill any outsiders on sight.
Looks like we have no choice.
Those soldiers...
They're just knocked out. They will probably stay unconscious for the rest of the day.
That's a relief...
Let's... keep this up...
Frey!
Ha! You dodged?
You guys look like fun!
Whoa! Whoa! You're good!
Kya hah hah! It's time to burn!
You're annoying! Just die!
*Huff* *Huff* You're... a monster.
You're very strong as well... But it's time to end this.
Hah hah, you're so full of yourself.
Kya hah hah! I was wondering where you were. But I see that you were getting beat up here!
Huh!? You...
You mongrel!
I hate you! Hate you! Hate you!
Whoa!
Hey! We're on the same side!
And I'll shoot you if you call me a mongrel again!
Bleh!
By the way, you fight really well!
But it's about time you die now!
Whoa, this guy is crazy!
Try blocking this!
This, and this!
Ack!? You blocked them all!?
What is that sword!?
Kya hah! Move! You're in the way!
Why, you!
Burn!
Are you trying to kill us all!?
Haa!
Wow! You're quite the opponent!
Ah! If only that mongrel didn't interfere!
Kya hah hah! You shot me!?
I told you that I was going to shoot you if you call me a mongrel again!
You really are a mad mongrel, kya hah hah!
What? You're dead meat! Eat lead!
Ah hah hah! I guess I'm going to have to burn this mongrel, too!
You're dead!
What the...?
An opening!
Kya!
Tsk, damn!
Whaa!
Ahhh!
*Sigh* What are you two doing?
Old man!
Huh? I thought you were dead!
(...This man is dangerous.)
Frey, just hold back a little.
In the name of the goddess!
Ahh, you let them go!
Well, that's probably because you shot at me, mongrel!
Don't start that again!
He has something to say to us.
...Return.
Ex-Hound Unit, Second Lieutenant Pansirone! Orders to return to the unit!
Yes, let's move.
Aren't we going to chase them? They've gotten on my nerves.
Yeah, yeah! Now that he's here, let's go and burn them all!
...Then, again, we should prioritize regrouping with the unit first!
Right! It's too bad we have to release them now, but we can find them later!
You probably saw, old man, but I fought really hard.
Aww, if only this mongrel didn't shoot at me...
Damn you! You called me a mongrel again!
Kya hah hah!
*Sigh*
Were they the Imperial Army?
They have incredible powers...
And if we run into that man who showed up at the end again... will we be able to get away?
It seemed like he let us go on purpose...
No... This isn't the time to think about that...
Ugh...
Frey, are you alright?
Kasel...
Why did I...?
That's what I wanted to ask.
You went unconscious all of a sudden.
Why all of a sudden?
Kasel...
I feel strange these days.
Maybe it's because your body is tired.
No, I feel like there's some sort of a strange power within me.
A strange power?
What do you mean by that?
A power that my body is denying...
I've had this for a very long time.
How long ago are we talking about?
The power that I've had even before I went into the orphanage...
The power that Great Priestess Iris sealed up for me.
How did you...?
Grandfather told me about it.
It wasn't long after I became an apprentice. I realized something was wrong with my body and went to talk with the Great Priestess.
I heard my grandfather talking with the Great Priestess. That's when he told me.
What did your grandfather say?
I don't know the details. My grandfather didn't know much, either.
He just told me to be careful.
And that nothing will happen if I continue to train my holy powers.
Actually, I've forgotten about this power ever since the Great Priestess sealed it up.
It's only recently that I've felt it again.
While we've been traveling together, I've felt some sort of an echo that spread throughout my body multiple times.
What could this be..?
I've never lost consciousness like this before, though.
I think it's gotten worse after we ran into King Kyle.
When I heard about how I came back to life back at Snow Mountain,
I believed that this strange power inside me saved my life. And I was relieved to know that this power was a blessing.
But I don't think that's completely right... There was something else, something small...
It feels as if, deep inside, the essence of this energy is so heavy that it's crushing me...
Frey...
We should go back to the Great Priestess right now.
No, not right now.
Don't be ridiculous. The fact that you passed out like that...
And from what you said, this strange power of yours started getting stronger after meeting King Kyle.
It just can't be good for you.
Listen to me, Kasel. This is very important to me.

Frey...
That way... I'll be able to know... if... I am on the right path...

Frey...
*Sigh* Fine.

You're all here already.

Scary people?

What if we meet him?

Roi...

The Tower of Sage?

I understand my skill level. And it's been a while since I've seen the old man's face...

And we're sure of it now.
Sure of what?

Malduk!?

...Hah hah.
Hah hah! That makes sense.

Anyway! I'll make sure to beat up that pile of bones!
Do you see that large pillar over there?

Malduk and the reactivated power... along with the transmission tower...
Then, we'll definitely have to check it out.
Yes, but you'd better be prepared.
Something keeps bothering me.
Huh? What are you talking about?

Frey, you don't look so good.
I must be a bit tired.
Hang in there, Frey! We're almost there.
Wait, over there... It's a giant...
Mechanical doll?

We found it.

If we have this...
Kasel.
Yes?
Come here.
What's this?
You're now coated with the dimensional power of the rift through the Holy Sword.
With this power, you will be able to partially resist the corrupting powers of Angmund that took down Kyle.
Maria...
*Sigh* It's been a long journey.
Thank you, Maria.
No, it's all thanks to you.
(I guess she's not going to talk about that, huh?)
(Hasn't she become less abrasive lately?)
And it's not over yet.
No! That's not it!
I mean, it's not over yet!
Now that you have this power, you have to go to that tower.
Of course.
Let's go. Regardless of what awaits us there...
I'm hoping that skull guy is waiting for us. I'm going to beat him up good.
I'm thinking the same thing.
Frey, what are you doing here?
Ah, Kasel...
This sky makes me think about a lot of things...
Yeah...
My father...
He was the King and also the hero who protected this land.
I'm going to have to face him soon... It's a lot to handle.
It just feels surreal.
Keep talking...
It all feels like someone else's story.
So far, I've been getting dragged around in my travels.
But I've learned a lot from recent events.
The precious smiles I've seen countless times from the people I love.
I understood after seeing them with my own eyes.
After getting rid of all anxiety, fear, and hesitation that held back my will to protect them, I finally realized it.
I believe King Kyle felt the same way.
I'm sure that's why he tried to protect everyone through corruption without giving up.
That's why I want to save him now.
That way, he can be who he really is: the Hero Kyle who wanted to protect everyone.
Is that too simple?
No, I think that's more than enough.
Hey...
Once everything is over. Let's go meet them.
Everyone who has helped us out throughout this journey.
Kasel...
I want you to be by my side when we do that.
I will always be by your side as well.
(I will always... always protect you by your side...)
Jane! Wait up!
How are you moving so fast while holding that huge thing?
Whew, my wings are all stiff.
That light...
Huh? This place is up and running again?
...I remember.
The desecrated... place...
The place that can't be reached anymore...
Ah... Ah... Ahhh...
This mark... Is it Mr. Handsome's?
Huh!? Jane! Mr. Handsome must be here!
Mr. Handsome?

This place is protected by a powerful barrier.
We're finally here, but we can't go inside?
Cleo, is there no other way?
Hold on, let me concentrate.

Watch out, everyone!
Huh?
Wha!?
Epis!?
Jane!?
Ah hah hah, it's the Warrior of the Holy Sword and his ragtag group.

That's what we wanted to say. Hah hah... What brings you here?
Huh? The Holy Sword recovered its power!
Ah! I knew being with this group would have been more fun!
Maria?
It's been a while. Has your personality improved since then?
...Buzz off.
Hello, Epis.
Morrah, I see that you're still sticking next to Maria.
Maria is my reason for existence.
Hah hah, you're really cute, Morrah. A real natural when it comes to saying stuff like that.
...Did I hear that wrong?
...I'll keep quiet.

You changed a lot.
Huh?
Your face looks much nicer.
Hah, hah hah...
Alright, as a warm-up before entering Mr. Handsome's dream...
I choose you!
Epis!
Ah hah hah, I'm only kidding!

Thank you.

But that troublemaker is being oddly quiet.
Hello-
There!
I removed the barrier!
Barrier? You guys just removed this tower's barrier? Impressive, that must have been hard!
Ahem! No barrier can withstand the efforts of this archmage!
It's coming... Ahh... It hurts... My heart...
Are you listening to me?
Wh-what is this!?
This energy... Is it the same kind from before?
...I can't breathe...
Maria!
Morrah, guard them.
But...
Hurry!
The Holy Sword is shaking... It's different from before...
What's going on?

Why is he coming out here?
Everyone... run...
Epis, do you know this energy?
You can't beat this one... Just run...
What?
Hurry!
Someone ripped through space?
Lucikiel...
Jane, behind me!
Jane?
I'm afraid...

...You really have bad taste.

Welcome, my daughter.
Malduk!?

Tsk.
This is very bad...
Malduk isn't the problem right now.

Come, Lucikiel. Let us kill the Warrior of the Holy Sword and take the sword to the Dark Lord.

Why should I listen to you?
Wh-what?

Y-you!
Fine! I will defeat you all with my true power!
Keep your eyes open, Lucikiel! And witness my power!
(He's here!)
Hurry, hurry! Kill the one that's calling down the lightning, Lucikiel!
Why... you!
Haaa!
Warrior of the Holy Sword!
(What? Why is the power of darkness not working against him?)
(It's not just the Holy Sword's power...)
(If he faces the Dark Lord with such power, it will be dangerous...)

Don't let your guard down. You never know what might happen.
Right!?
Lucikiel, hurry! Stop that! You're supposed to be an officer of the Dark Legion!

I-it can't end like this!

I'll take you with me, Warrior of the Holy Sword!
Self-destruction!?
Kasel!
He's trying to self-destruct! Get out!
Frey!
...Wail...
Legios!
Waaaah!
Ugh... You...
Die... Malduk.

You really don't change... till the very end... Theo Phil Grayum.

Kuh!

Yeah, I'm fine.

Maria!

Ah... Ahh...
Your spear, Theo Phil Grayum has finally come to serve you.
Ahh... Theo.

This is a fight between me and him, which we couldn't finish 100 years ago.

Theo.
I am Theo Phil Grayum. A Knight of the Gray Republic.

And this might be...
the device that could send us off to where my father is at...
Are you ready?
Yes.
No matter what comes after this...
Let's put an end to it.
Theo, a good friend of yours named Ezekiel

This is the Swamps of Gargoss..
Traces of war... lingering scent of... blood...
This place is filled with sorrow.
My Lady, the Gray Republic needs you.
Who are they? Why are they blocking our way?
Ughh...
Uhh...
Their eyes have already gone insane.
It's...
It's his power.
Him?
The traitor from the Republic of Gray.
The one who opened the Demon's Gate out of greed so that he could become a demon.
The one who ruined his own country and offered it to the Dark Lord.
Malduk, the head court wizard...
I will not forgive him.
I will show no mercy towards that traitor.

Wow... Your lightning seems to have gotten stronger.
I was able to recover a part of Legios's power from the battle at the Desert.
Wait, it was not as strong as it could've been?
Hey! Wake up!
Hey!
Ugh...
What the hell!? What did you do to make your body heat up like this!?
Argh!
Stay with me, Theo!
You shall become my spear... and become the pillar that guides my path...
I, Theo Phil Grayum, swear to become your knight and your spear.
To protect your kingdom as the pillar that supports it.
Ah...
You're finally awake.
Looks like... Legios's power was activated.
Yes, you've become really strong.

I see... I couldn't control it... I still have a long way to go...
Anyway, you can just stay here for now.
No, I don't have time to waste.
Listen to me, you can't handle this now.
What can you do when you keep passing out like that?
As you saw, using Legios taxes my body...
Yes, I know. So, just stay put.
I'll look for that skeleton or whatever.
Along with that Lady of yours.
Hey.
Let me know if something happens.
.. Hah hah... Got it...
For 100 years... I've been looking for your traces.
All I wanted to do was return to your side to fulfill my duty as your spear...
But even though I only had eyes for you, I ended up taking possession of many things.
I want to show them to you.
A black pillar?
Thats...
My spear, the people are in danger. Please go stop the Berserk Golem.
My Lady!\nDon't worry about me, I'll protect this place.
I'll be here when you come back.
That's the black pillar that destroyed the Republic of Gray...
...He must be here.

I will use all the corpses of these pesky humans for my experiments...
No, you won't be able to do that now.
Wha..what the..
Malduk...
I'll definitely make sure you die today.
Why are you here!?
The black pillar... You dare bring this again...?
Just like back then...
You're persistent, survivor of Gray!
Just like when you brought in all those demons by opening the gate!
Die!
Legios!
Kuh!
Damn it! Why!? Why are you here again!?
No... This is for the best...
Hah hah hah! Hah hah hah hah!
Yes, survivor of Gray... I will get rid of you today for sure!
Stop right there!
Yes, follow me! I will lead you to the one who'll put an end to you.
Yes...
Legios... I have only one scar left on my left arm.

Come, the vessel of the transcendent.
He really is terrifying...
Mr. Handsome, you really fought against him 100 years ago!?
There were a few more.
(Huh? Does he mean that he was more of a monster then? But with his current power...)

Heh... You act like you don't care, but you actually do?

Hm, I already know about him and the other as well.

As expected..you seem totally unmoved.
I guess that's what makes you a demon!
...Here I come.
This thrill! This wound! This power!
Ah hah hah hah! Rampage, Barbatos!
Wh-what's going on!?
*Pant* *Pant*
This is not enough...
Come on, Demon...
That is all you got?
Where is the God of Lightning with his fearsome strength,

I will grant you time. I will wait until you can manage to actually entertain me.
Whew... He's gone...
...The scary person... is gone...
My Lady...
Theo...
Do you remember me?
Theo... My dear Theo...
Yes, it's me. Your spear... You look so weak...
You could say that she barely has any memories. Only bits and parts of it.
Malduk brought her back as an undead.

I guess you were really important to be called that, Mr. Handsome.
My Lady...
I will protect you from now on.
...My guardian... my spear.
